an6.1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an6.1:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an6.1:2.3_2: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano,
an6.1:2.8_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
an6.1:2.9_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an6.1:3.2_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
an6.2:1.1_0: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an6.2:1.3_2: bhikkhu anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
an6.2:1.3_13: imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parimasati parimajjati;
an6.2:2.1_1: sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāti—dibbe ca mānuse ca,
an6.2:3.1_0: Parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti.
an6.2:3.2_0: Sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ sarāgaṁ cittanti pajānāti,
an6.2:3.17_0: avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ avimuttaṁ cittanti pajānāti.
an6.2:4.1_2: Iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
an6.2:5.1_0: Dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an6.2:5.1_2: ‘ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā
an6.2:5.1_4: te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannā.
an6.2:5.1_5: Ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā
an6.2:5.1_7: te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapannā’ti.
an6.2:5.1_8: Iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an6.2:6.1_0: Āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an6.2:7.1_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…

an6.4:1.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…

an6.5:2.2_2: rañño bhadro assājānīyo khamo hoti rūpānaṁ,

an6.5:3.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…

an6.6:2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti rūpānaṁ …pe… khamo dhammānaṁ.

an6.9:1.3_0: Buddhānussati, dhammānussati, saṅghānussati, sīlānussati, cāgānussati, devatānussati.
an6.10:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
an6.10:1.2_0: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.10:1.3_0: “yo so, bhante, ariyasāvako āgataphalo viññātasāsano, so katamena vihārena bahulaṁ viharatī”ti?
an6.10:2.1_0: “Yo so, mahānāma, ariyasāvako āgataphalo viññātasāsano, so iminā vihārena bahulaṁ viharati.
an6.10:2.3_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an6.10:2.4_1: samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṁ anussarati nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti,
an6.10:2.5_0: ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti tathāgataṁ ārabbha.
an6.10:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahānāma, ariyasāvako dhammaṁ anussarati:
an6.10:3.2_0: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
an6.10:3.3_1: samaye ariyasāvako dhammaṁ anussarati nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti,
an6.10:3.4_0: ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti dhammaṁ ārabbha.
an6.10:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahānāma, ariyasāvako saṅghaṁ anussarati:
an6.10:4.2_4: yadidaṁ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo
an6.10:4.3_1: samaye ariyasāvako saṅghaṁ anussarati nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti,
an6.10:4.4_0: ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti saṅghaṁ ārabbha.
an6.10:5.1_1: ariyasāvako attano sīlāni anussarati akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṁvattanikāni.
an6.10:5.2_1: samaye ariyasāvako sīlaṁ anussarati nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti,
an6.10:5.3_0: ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti sīlaṁ ārabbha.
an6.10:6.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahānāma, ariyasāvako attano cāgaṁ anussarati:
an6.10:6.3_0: Yohaṁ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitāya pajāya vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṁ ajjhāvasāmi muttacāgo payatapāṇi
an6.10:6.4_1: samaye ariyasāvako cāgaṁ anussarati nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti,
an6.10:6.5_0: ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti cāgaṁ ārabbha.
an6.10:7.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahānāma, ariyasāvako devatānussatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.10:7.3_0: Yathārūpāya saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā,
an6.10:7.4_0: Yathārūpena sīlena samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā,
an6.10:7.5_0: Yathārūpena sutena samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā,
an6.10:7.6_0: Yathārūpena cāgena samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā,
an6.10:7.7_0: Yathārūpāya paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā,
an6.10:7.8_1: samaye ariyasāvako attano ca tāsañca devatānaṁ saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarati
an6.10:7.8_2: nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti,
an6.10:7.9_0: ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti tā devatā ārabbha.
an6.10:8.1_0: Yo so, mahānāma, ariyasāvako āgataphalo viññātasāsano, so iminā vihārena bahulaṁ viharatī”ti.
an6.11:1.3_2: bhikkhuno mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca,
an6.11:2.1_2: bhikkhuno mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca,
an6.11:3.1_2: bhikkhuno mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca,
an6.11:4.1_2: bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampi tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhattabhogī
an6.11:5.1_2: bhikkhu yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni
an6.11:5.1_3: samādhisaṁvattanikāni tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca,
an6.11:6.1_2: bhikkhu yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato
an6.11:6.1_3: viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca,
an6.11:7.1_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammā sāraṇīyā”ti.
an6.12:1.1_2: dhammā sāraṇīyā piyakaraṇā garukaraṇā saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattanti.
an6.12:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca,
an6.12:1.4_0: ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
an6.12:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti …pe….
an6.12:3.1_0: Mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca,
an6.12:3.1_1: ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
an6.12:4.1_2: bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampi tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhattabhogī
an6.12:4.1_4: ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
an6.12:5.1_2: bhikkhu yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni
an6.12:5.1_3: samādhisaṁvattanikāni tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca,
an6.12:5.1_4: ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
an6.12:6.1_2: bhikkhu yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato
an6.12:6.1_3: viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca,
an6.12:6.2_0: ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
an6.12:7.1_2: cha dhammā sāraṇīyā piyakaraṇā garukaraṇā saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an6.13:1.4_0: ‘mettā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
an6.13:1.5_0: atha ca pana me byāpādo cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
an6.13:1.7_1: anavakāso yaṁ mettāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
an6.13:1.8_0: atha ca panassa byāpādo cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.13:2.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an6.13:2.2_0: ‘karuṇā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
an6.13:2.3_0: atha ca pana me vihesā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
an6.13:2.5_1: anavakāso yaṁ karuṇāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
an6.13:2.6_0: atha ca panassa vihesā cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.13:3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an6.13:3.2_0: ‘muditā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
an6.13:3.3_0: atha ca pana me arati cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
an6.13:3.5_1: anavakāso yaṁ muditāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
an6.13:3.6_0: atha ca panassa arati cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.13:4.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an6.13:4.2_0: ‘upekkhā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
an6.13:4.3_0: atha ca pana me rāgo cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
an6.13:4.5_1: anavakāso yaṁ upekkhāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
an6.13:4.6_0: atha ca panassa rāgo cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.13:5.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an6.13:5.2_0: ‘animittā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
an6.13:5.3_0: atha ca pana me nimittānusāri viññāṇaṁ hotī’ti.
an6.13:5.5_1: anavakāso yaṁ animittāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
an6.13:5.6_0: atha ca panassa nimittānusāri viññāṇaṁ bhavissati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.13:6.1_0: Idha pana bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an6.13:6.2_0: ‘asmīti kho me vigataṁ, ayamahamasmīti ca na samanupassāmi;
an6.13:6.3_0: atha ca pana me vicikicchākathaṅkathāsallaṁ cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
an6.13:6.5_0: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṁ asmīti vigate ayamahamasmīti ca na samanupassato;
an6.13:6.6_0: atha ca panassa vicikicchākathaṅkathāsallaṁ cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.13:6.7_0: Nissaraṇañhetaṁ, āvuso, vicikicchākathaṅkathāsallassa yadidaṁ asmīti mānasamugghāto’ti.
an6.13:7.1_0: Imā kho, bhikkhave, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo”ti.
an6.14:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.14:1.3_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an6.14:2.1_1: bhikkhu vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an6.14:2.2_1: bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an6.14:3.1_1: bhikkhu kammārāmo hoti kammarato kammārāmataṁ anuyutto,
an6.14:3.2_1: bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an6.14:3.4_0: ‘bhikkhu sakkāyābhirato nappajahāsi sakkāyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya’.
an6.14:4.1_1: bhikkhu vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an6.14:4.2_1: bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an6.14:5.1_1: bhikkhu na kammārāmo hoti na kammarato na kammārāmataṁ anuyutto,
an6.14:5.1_2: na bhassārāmo hoti na bhassarato na bhassārāmataṁ anuyutto,
an6.14:5.1_3: na niddārāmo hoti na niddārato na niddārāmataṁ anuyutto,
an6.14:5.1_4: na saṅgaṇikārāmo hoti na saṅgaṇikarato na saṅgaṇikārāmataṁ anuyutto,
an6.14:5.1_5: na saṁsaggārāmo hoti na saṁsaggarato na saṁsaggārāmataṁ anuyutto,
an6.14:5.1_6: na papañcārāmo hoti na papañcarato na papañcārāmataṁ anuyutto.
an6.14:5.2_1: bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an6.14:5.4_0: ‘bhikkhu nibbānābhirato pajahāsi sakkāyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’ti.
an6.15:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.15:1.2_0: “tathā tathāvuso, bhikkhu vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato kālakiriyā anutappā hoti.
an6.15:1.3_1: bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato kālakiriyā anutappā hoti?
an6.15:2.1_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu kammārāmo hoti kammarato kammārāmataṁ anuyutto, bhassārāmo hoti …
an6.15:2.6_1: bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato kālakiriyā anutappā hoti.
an6.15:2.8_0: ‘bhikkhu sakkāyābhirato nappajahāsi sakkāyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya’.
an6.15:3.1_1: bhikkhu vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato kālakiriyā ananutappā hoti.
an6.15:3.2_1: bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato kālakiriyā ananutappā hoti?
an6.15:4.1_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na kammārāmo hoti na kammarato na kammārāmataṁ anuyutto, na bhassārāmo hoti …
an6.15:4.5_0: na papañcārāmo hoti na papañcarato na papañcārāmataṁ anuyutto.
an6.15:4.6_1: bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato kālakiriyā ananutappā hoti.
an6.15:4.8_0: ‘bhikkhu nibbānābhirato pajahāsi sakkāyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’ti.
an6.16:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
an6.16:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena nakulapitā gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
an6.16:1.3_0: Atha kho nakulamātā gahapatānī nakulapitaraṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca:
an6.16:2.4_0: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:2.5_0: ‘na nakulamātā gahapatānī mamaccayena sakkhissati dārake posetuṁ, gharāvāsaṁ santharitun’ti.
an6.16:2.6_0: Na kho panetaṁ, gahapati, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an6.16:2.7_0: Kusalāhaṁ, gahapati, kappāsaṁ kantituṁ veṇiṁ olikhituṁ.
an6.16:2.8_0: Sakkomahaṁ, gahapati, tavaccayena dārake posetuṁ, gharāvāsaṁ santharituṁ.
an6.16:2.9_0: Tasmātiha tvaṁ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:3.1_0: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:3.3_0: Na kho panetaṁ, gahapati, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an6.16:3.4_0: Tvañceva kho, gahapati, jānāsi ahañca, yaṁ no soḷasavassāni gahaṭṭhakaṁ brahmacariyaṁ samāciṇṇaṁ.
an6.16:3.5_0: Tasmātiha tvaṁ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:4.1_0: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:4.2_0: ‘nakulamātā gahapatānī mamaccayena na dassanakāmā bhavissati bhagavato na dassanakāmā bhikkhusaṅghassā’ti.
an6.16:4.3_0: Na kho panetaṁ, gahapati, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an6.16:4.5_0: Tasmātiha tvaṁ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:5.1_0: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:5.3_0: Na kho panetaṁ, gahapati, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an6.16:5.4_1: tassa bhagavato sāvikā gihī odātavasanā sīlesu paripūrakāriniyo,
an6.16:5.5_0: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā—ayaṁ so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumāragire
an6.16:5.6_0: Tasmātiha tvaṁ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:6.1_0: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:6.3_0: Na kho panetaṁ, gahapati, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an6.16:6.4_1: tassa bhagavato sāvikā gihī odātavasanā lābhiniyo ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa,
an6.16:6.5_0: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā—ayaṁ so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumāragire
an6.16:6.6_0: Tasmātiha tvaṁ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:7.1_0: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:7.2_0: ‘na nakulamātā gahapatānī imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ogādhappattā patigādhappattā assāsappattā tiṇṇavicikicchā
an6.16:7.3_0: Na kho panetaṁ, gahapati, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an6.16:7.4_1: tassa bhagavato sāvikā gihī odātavasanā imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ogādhappattā patigādhappattā assāsappattā
an6.16:7.4_2: tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṅkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane viharanti,
an6.16:7.5_0: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā—ayaṁ so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumāragire
an6.16:7.6_0: Tasmātiha tvaṁ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:8.1_0: Atha kho nakulapituno gahapatissa nakulamātarā gahapatāniyā iminā ovādena ovadiyamānassa so ābādho ṭhānaso paṭippassambhi.
an6.16:8.2_0: Vuṭṭhahi ca nakulapitā gahapati tamhā ābādhā;
an6.16:8.3_0: tathā pahīno ca pana nakulapituno gahapatissa so ābādho ahosi.
an6.16:8.4_0: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā daṇḍamolubbha yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.16:8.4_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho nakulapitaraṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an6.16:9.2_0: Yassa te nakulamātā gahapatānī anukampikā atthakāmā ovādikā anusāsikā.
an6.16:9.3_1: mama sāvikā gihī odātavasanā sīlesu paripūrakāriniyo,
an6.16:9.4_1: mama sāvikā gihī odātavasanā lābhiniyo ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa,
an6.16:9.5_1: mama sāvikā gihī odātavasanā imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ogādhappattā patigādhappattā assāsappattā tiṇṇavicikicchā
an6.16:9.6_0: Lābhā te, gahapati, suladdhaṁ te, gahapati.
an6.16:9.7_0: Yassa te nakulamātā gahapatānī anukampikā atthakāmā ovādikā anusāsikā”ti.
an6.17:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an6.17:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenupaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.17:1.3_0: Āyasmāpi kho sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenupaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.17:1.12_0: āyasmāpi kho ānando sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenupaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.17:1.13_0: Atha kho bhagavā bahudeva rattiṁ nisajjāya vītināmetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
an6.17:1.14_0: Tepi kho āyasmanto acirapakkantassa bhagavato uṭṭhāyāsanā yathāvihāraṁ agamaṁsu.
an6.17:1.15_0: Ye pana tattha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ te yāva sūriyuggamanā kākacchamānā supiṁsu.
an6.17:1.16_0: Addasā kho bhagavā dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena te bhikkhū yāva sūriyuggamanā kākacchamāne supante.
an6.17:1.17_0: Disvā yenupaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
an6.17:2.11_0: Kahaṁ nu kho te, bhikkhave, therā sāvakā gatā”ti?
an6.17:2.12_0: “Tepi kho, bhante, āyasmanto acirapakkantassa bhagavato uṭṭhāyāsanā yathāvihāraṁ agamaṁsū”ti.
an6.17:2.13_0: “Tena no tumhe, bhikkhave, therā bhikkhū nāgatāti yāva sūriyuggamanā kākacchamānā supatha?
an6.17:2.15_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an6.17:2.16_0: ‘rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto yāvadatthaṁ seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharanto yāvajīvaṁ
an6.17:2.16_1: rajjaṁ kārento janapadassa vā piyo manāpo’”ti?
an6.17:2.19_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an6.17:2.20_0: ‘rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto yāvadatthaṁ seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharanto yāvajīvaṁ
an6.17:2.20_1: rajjaṁ kārento janapadassa vā piyo manāpo’ti.
an6.17:3.2_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an6.17:3.7_0: pūgagāmaṇiko yāvadatthaṁ seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharanto yāvajīvaṁ pūgagāmaṇikattaṁ kārento pūgassa vā piyo manāpo’”ti?
an6.17:3.10_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an6.17:3.11_0: ‘pūgagāmaṇiko yāvadatthaṁ seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharanto yāvajīvaṁ pūgagāmaṇikattaṁ vā kārento pūgassa vā piyo manāpo’ti.
an6.17:4.2_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an6.17:4.3_0: ‘samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā yāvadatthaṁ seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto indriyesu aguttadvāro
an6.17:4.3_1: bhojane amattaññū jāgariyaṁ ananuyutto avipassako kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pubbarattāpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ
an6.17:4.3_2: dhammānaṁ bhāvanānuyogaṁ ananuyutto āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme
an6.17:4.6_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an6.17:4.7_0: ‘samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā yāvadatthaṁ seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto indriyesu aguttadvāro
an6.17:4.7_1: bhojane amattaññū jāgariyaṁ ananuyutto avipassako kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pubbarattāpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ
an6.17:4.7_2: dhammānaṁ bhāvanānuyogaṁ ananuyutto āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme
an6.18:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ carati mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ.
an6.18:1.2_0: Addasā kho bhagavā addhānamaggappaṭipanno aññatarasmiṁ padese macchikaṁ macchabandhaṁ macche vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇamānaṁ.
an6.18:1.3_0: Disvā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle paññatte āsane nisīdi.
an6.18:1.5_2: amuṁ macchikaṁ macchabandhaṁ macche vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇamānan”ti?
an6.18:2.2_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an6.18:2.3_0: ‘macchiko macchabandho macche vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇamāno tena kammena tena ājīvena hatthiyāyī vā assayāyī
an6.18:2.3_1: vā rathayāyī vā yānayāyī vā bhogabhogī vā mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ ajjhāvasanto’”ti?
an6.18:2.6_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an6.18:2.7_0: ‘macchiko macchabandho macche vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇamāno tena kammena tena ājīvena hatthiyāyī vā assayāyī
an6.18:2.7_1: vā rathayāyī vā yānayāyī vā bhogabhogī vā mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ ajjhāvasanto’ti.
an6.18:2.9_3: tasmā so neva hatthiyāyī hoti na assayāyī na rathayāyī na yānayāyī na bhogabhogī,
an6.18:3.2_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an6.18:3.3_0: ‘goghātako gāvo vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇamāno tena kammena tena ājīvena hatthiyāyī vā assayāyī vā rathayāyī
an6.18:3.3_1: vā yānayāyī vā bhogabhogī vā mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ ajjhāvasanto’”ti?
an6.18:3.6_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an6.18:3.7_0: ‘goghātako gāvo vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇamāno tena kammena tena ājīvena hatthiyāyī vā assayāyī vā rathayāyī
an6.18:3.7_1: vā yānayāyī vā bhogabhogī vā mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ ajjhāvasanto’ti.
an6.18:3.9_3: tasmā so neva hatthiyāyī hoti na assayāyī na rathayāyī na yānayāyī na bhogabhogī,
an6.18:4.2_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an6.18:4.6_0: māgaviko mage vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇamāno tena kammena tena ājīvena hatthiyāyī vā assayāyī vā rathayāyī
an6.18:4.6_1: vā yānayāyī vā bhogabhogī vā mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ ajjhāvasanto’”ti?
an6.18:4.9_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an6.18:4.10_0: ‘māgaviko mage vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇamāno tena kammena tena ājīvena hatthiyāyī vā assayāyī vā rathayāyī
an6.18:4.10_1: vā yānayāyī vā bhogabhogī vā mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ ajjhāvasanto’ti.
an6.18:4.12_3: tasmā so neva hatthiyāyī hoti na assayāyī na rathayāyī na yānayāyī na bhogabhogī,
an6.18:4.13_2: tiracchānagate pāṇe vajjhe vadhāyupanīte pāpakena manasānupekkhamāno neva hatthiyāyī bhavissati na assayāyī na rathayāyī na yānayāyī na bhogabhogī,
an6.18:4.14_0: Ko pana vādo yaṁ manussabhūtaṁ vajjhaṁ vadhāyupanītaṁ pāpakena manasānupekkhati.
an6.18:4.15_0: Tañhi tassa, bhikkhave, hoti dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
an6.18:4.16_0: Kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjatī”ti.
an6.19:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
an6.19:1.6_0: “maraṇassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā.
an6.19:2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.19:2.3_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:2.5_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ rattindivaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:2.6_0: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:3.3_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:3.5_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ divasaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:3.6_0: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:4.3_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:4.5_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi,
an6.19:4.6_0: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:5.3_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:5.5_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ cattāro pañca ālope saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi,
an6.19:5.6_0: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:6.3_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:6.5_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekaṁ ālopaṁ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi,
an6.19:6.6_0: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:7.3_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:7.5_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ assasitvā vā passasāmi passasitvā vā assasāmi,
an6.19:7.6_0: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:8.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.19:8.2_0: “yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:8.3_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ rattindivaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:9.1_0: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:9.2_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ divasaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:10.1_0: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:10.2_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi,
an6.19:11.1_0: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:11.2_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ cattāro pañca ālope saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi,
an6.19:12.1_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhū pamattā viharanti dandhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāventi āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an6.19:13.1_0: Yo ca khvāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:13.2_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekaṁ ālopaṁ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi,
an6.19:14.1_0: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:14.2_0: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ assasitvā vā passasāmi passasitvā vā assasāmi,
an6.19:15.1_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhū appamattā viharanti tikkhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāventi āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an6.19:16.2_0: ‘appamattā viharissāma, tikkhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāvessāma āsavānaṁ khayāyā’ti.
an6.20:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
an6.20:1.3_0: “maraṇassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā.
an6.20:1.4_2: maraṇassati kathaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā?
an6.20:2.1_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divase nikkhante rattiyā patihitāya iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an6.20:2.3_0: ahi vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya, vicchiko vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya, satapadī vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya;
an6.20:2.4_0: tena me assa kālakiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo.
an6.20:2.6_0: tena me assa kālakiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo’ti.
an6.20:2.8_0: ‘atthi nu kho me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīnā, ye me assu rattiṁ kālaṁ karontassa antarāyāyā’ti.
an6.20:3.1_0: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
an6.20:3.2_1: ye me assu rattiṁ kālaṁ karontassa antarāyāyā’ti, tena,

an6.20:3.2_4: ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca karaṇīyaṁ.
an6.20:3.3_2: ādittacelo vā ādittasīso vā tasseva celassa vā sīsassa vā nibbāpanāya adhimattaṁ chandañca vāyāmañca
an6.20:3.3_3: ussāhañca ussoḷhiñca appaṭivāniñca satiñca sampajaññañca kareyya;
an6.20:3.4_2: tena bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya adhimatto chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho
an6.20:3.4_3: ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca karaṇīyaṁ.

an6.20:4.2_1: ye me assu rattiṁ kālaṁ karontassa antarāyāyā’ti, tena,
an6.20:4.2_3: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.

an6.21:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati sāmagāmake pokkharaṇiyāyaṁ.
an6.21:1.2_0: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ pokkharaṇiyaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.21:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.21:2.4_0: ime kho, bhante, tayo dhammā bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an6.21:2.7_0: Atha kho sā devatā “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an6.21:3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.21:3.2_2: rattiṁ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ pokkharaṇiyaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an6.21:3.6_0: ime kho, bhante, tayo dhammā bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattantī’ti.
an6.21:3.8_0: Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an6.21:3.9_0: Tesaṁ vo, bhikkhave, alābhā tesaṁ dulladdhaṁ, ye vo devatāpi jānanti kusalehi dhammehi parihāyamāne.
an6.21:4.1_0: Aparepi, bhikkhave, tayo parihāniye dhamme desessāmi.
an6.21:4.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an6.21:4.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an6.21:4.7_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo parihāniyā dhammā.
an6.21:5.1_3: sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihāyiṁsu kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.21:5.2_3: sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihāyissanti kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.21:5.3_3: sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihāyanti kusalehi dhammehī”ti.
an6.22:1.1_0: “Chayime, bhikkhave, aparihāniye dhamme desessāmi, taṁ suṇātha …pe…
an6.22:1.2_0: katame ca, bhikkhave, cha aparihāniyā dhammā?
an6.22:1.3_0: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, na saṅgaṇikārāmatā, sovacassatā, kalyāṇamittatā—
an6.22:1.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha aparihāniyā dhammā.
an6.22:2.1_3: sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihāyiṁsu kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.22:2.2_3: sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihāyissanti kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.22:2.3_3: sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihāyanti kusalehi dhammehī”ti.
an6.24:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu himavantaṁ pabbatarājaṁ padāleyya,
an6.24:1.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu himavantaṁ pabbatarājaṁ padāleyya,
an6.25:1.4_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.

an6.27:1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.27:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.27:1.2_0: “kati nu kho, bhante, samayā manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamitun”ti?
an6.27:1.3_0: “Chayime, bhikkhu, samayā manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.27:2.2_1: yasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati kāmarāgaparetena,
an6.27:2.2_2: uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti tasmiṁ samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
an6.27:2.3_2: uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāmi.
an6.27:2.4_0: Sādhu vata me āyasmā kāmarāgassa pahānāya dhammaṁ desetū’ti.
an6.27:2.5_0: Tassa manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu kāmarāgassa pahānāya dhammaṁ deseti.
an6.27:2.6_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhu, paṭhamo samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.27:3.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati byāpādaparetena,
an6.27:3.1_2: uppannassa ca byāpādassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti tasmiṁ samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
an6.27:3.2_2: uppannassa ca byāpādassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāmi.
an6.27:3.3_0: Sādhu vata me āyasmā byāpādassa pahānāya dhammaṁ desetū’ti.
an6.27:3.4_0: Tassa manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu byāpādassa pahānāya dhammaṁ deseti.
an6.27:3.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhu, dutiyo samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.27:4.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati thinamiddhaparetena,
an6.27:4.1_2: uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti tasmiṁ samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
an6.27:4.2_2: uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāmi.
an6.27:4.3_0: Sādhu vata me āyasmā thinamiddhassa pahānāya dhammaṁ desetū’ti.
an6.27:4.4_0: Tassa manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu thinamiddhassa pahānāya dhammaṁ deseti.
an6.27:4.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhu, tatiyo samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.27:5.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu uddhaccakukkuccapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati uddhaccakukkuccaparetena,
an6.27:5.1_2: uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti tasmiṁ samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
an6.27:5.2_2: uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāmi.
an6.27:5.3_0: Sādhu vata me āyasmā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya dhammaṁ desetū’ti.
an6.27:5.4_0: Tassa manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya dhammaṁ deseti.
an6.27:5.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhu, catuttho samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.27:6.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati vicikicchāparetena,
an6.27:6.1_2: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti tasmiṁ samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
an6.27:6.2_2: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāmi.
an6.27:6.3_0: Sādhu vata me āyasmā vicikicchāya pahānāya dhammaṁ desetū’ti.
an6.27:6.4_0: Tassa manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu vicikicchāya pahānāya dhammaṁ deseti.
an6.27:6.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhu, pañcamo samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.27:7.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu yaṁ nimittaṁ āgamma yaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti taṁ
an6.27:7.1_2: nimittaṁ nappajānāti tasmiṁ samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
an6.27:7.2_1: yaṁ nimittaṁ āgamma yaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti,
an6.27:7.3_0: Sādhu vata me āyasmā āsavānaṁ khayāya dhammaṁ desetū’ti.
an6.27:7.4_0: Tassa manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayāya dhammaṁ deseti.
an6.27:7.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhu, chaṭṭho samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.27:8.1_0: Ime kho, bhikkhu, cha samayā manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamitun”ti.
an6.28:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ sambahulā therā bhikkhū bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
an6.28:1.2_0: Atha kho tesaṁ therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṁ maṇḍalamāḷe sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
an6.28:1.3_0: “ko nu kho, āvuso, samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamitun”ti?
an6.28:2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.28:2.2_1: samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto pāde pakkhāletvā nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ
an6.28:2.2_2: ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā,
an6.28:2.2_3: so samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamitun”ti.
an6.28:3.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
an6.28:3.2_0: “na kho, āvuso, so samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.28:3.3_1: samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto pāde pakkhāletvā nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ
an6.28:3.3_2: ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā,
an6.28:3.4_0: Tasmā so asamayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.28:3.5_1: samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito vihārapacchāyāyaṁ nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ
an6.28:3.5_2: ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā,
an6.28:3.5_3: so samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamitun”ti.
an6.28:4.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
an6.28:4.2_0: “na kho, āvuso, so samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.28:4.3_1: samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito vihārapacchāyāyaṁ nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ
an6.28:4.3_2: ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā,
an6.28:4.3_3: yadevassa divā samādhinimittaṁ manasikataṁ hoti tadevassa tasmiṁ samaye samudācarati.
an6.28:4.4_0: Tasmā so asamayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.28:4.5_1: samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā,
an6.28:4.5_2: so samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamitun”ti.
an6.28:5.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
an6.28:5.2_0: “na kho, āvuso, so samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.28:5.3_1: samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā,
an6.28:5.3_2: ojaṭṭhāyissa tasmiṁ samaye kāyo hoti phāsussa hoti buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ.
an6.28:5.4_0: Tasmā so asamayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamitun”ti.
an6.28:6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte āyasmā mahākaccāno there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.28:6.2_0: “sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
an6.28:6.3_0: ‘chayime, bhikkhu, samayā manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.28:7.2_1: yasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati kāmarāgaparetena,
an6.28:7.2_2: uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
an6.28:7.2_3: tasmiṁ samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
an6.28:7.3_2: uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāmi.
an6.28:7.4_0: Sādhu vata me āyasmā kāmarāgassa pahānāya dhammaṁ desetū”ti.
an6.28:7.5_0: Tassa manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu kāmarāgassa pahānāya dhammaṁ deseti.
an6.28:7.6_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhu, paṭhamo samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
an6.28:8.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhu, yasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati …pe….
an6.28:12.1_0: Yaṁ nimittaṁ āgamma yaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti,
an6.28:12.1_1: taṁ nimittaṁ na jānāti na passati,
an6.28:12.1_2: tasmiṁ samaye manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
an6.28:12.2_1: yaṁ nimittaṁ āgamma yaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti taṁ nimittaṁ na jānāmi na passāmi.
an6.28:12.3_0: Sādhu vata me āyasmā āsavānaṁ khayāya dhammaṁ desetū”ti.
an6.28:12.4_0: Tassa manobhāvanīyo bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayāya dhammaṁ deseti.
an6.28:12.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhu, chaṭṭho samayo manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ’.
an6.28:13.1_0: Sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
an6.28:13.2_0: ‘ime kho, bhikkhu, cha samayā manobhāvanīyassa bhikkhuno dassanāya upasaṅkamitun’”ti.
an6.29:1.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ āmantesi:
an6.29:1.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā udāyī tuṇhī ahosi.
an6.29:1.4_0: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ āmantesi:
an6.29:1.6_0: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā udāyī tuṇhī ahosi.
an6.29:1.7_0: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ āmantesi:
an6.29:1.9_0: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā udāyī tuṇhī ahosi.
an6.29:2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ etadavoca:
an6.29:2.4_1: bhikkhu anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati—Seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo …pe….
an6.29:2.4_2: Iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
an6.29:3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
an6.29:4.3_0: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an6.29:4.4_0: Idaṁ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṁ evaṁ bhāvitaṁ evaṁ bahulīkataṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṁvattati.
an6.29:5.2_0: iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṁ cittaṁ bhāveti.
an6.29:5.3_0: Idaṁ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṁ evaṁ bhāvitaṁ evaṁ bahulīkataṁ ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṁvattati.
an6.29:6.1_1: bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ uddhaṁ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṁ pūraṁ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati:
an6.29:6.2_0: ‘atthi imasmiṁ kāye kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco,
an6.29:6.2_4: pittaṁ semhaṁ pubbo lohitaṁ sedo medo,
an6.29:6.2_5: assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttan’ti.
an6.29:6.3_0: Idaṁ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṁ evaṁ bhāvitaṁ evaṁ bahulīkataṁ kāmarāgappahānāya saṁvattati.
an6.29:7.1_1: bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṁ sivathikāya chaṭṭitaṁ ekāhamataṁ vā dvīhamataṁ vā tīhamataṁ vā uddhumātakaṁ vinīlakaṁ vipubbakajātaṁ.
an6.29:8.1_0: Seyyathāpi vā pana passeyya sarīraṁ sīvathikāya chaṭṭitaṁ kākehi vā khajjamānaṁ kulalehi vā khajjamānaṁ
an6.29:8.1_1: gijjhehi vā khajjamānaṁ sunakhehi vā khajjamānaṁ siṅgālehi vā khajjamānaṁ vividhehi vā pāṇakajātehi khajjamānaṁ.
an6.29:9.1_0: Seyyathāpi vā pana passeyya sarīraṁ sīvathikāya chaṭṭitaṁ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ samaṁsalohitaṁ nhārusambandhaṁ …pe…
an6.29:9.4_1: aññena hatthaṭṭhikaṁ aññena pādaṭṭhikaṁ aññena jaṅghaṭṭhikaṁ aññena ūruṭṭhikaṁ aññena kaṭiṭṭhikaṁ aññena
an6.29:9.4_2: phāsukaṭṭhikaṁ aññena piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhikaṁ aññena khandhaṭṭhikaṁ aññena gīvaṭṭhikaṁ aññena hanukaṭṭhikaṁ
an6.29:9.4_4: aṭṭhikāni setāni saṅkhavaṇṇappaṭibhāgāni aṭṭhikāni puñjakitāni terovassikāni aṭṭhikāni pūtīni cuṇṇakajātāni.
an6.29:9.7_0: Idaṁ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṁ evaṁ bhāvitaṁ evaṁ bahulīkataṁ asmimānasamugghātāya saṁvattati.
an6.29:10.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhante, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an6.29:10.2_0: Idaṁ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṁ evaṁ bhāvitaṁ evaṁ bahulīkataṁ anekadhātupaṭivedhāya saṁvattati.
an6.29:11.2_0: Tena hi tvaṁ, ānanda, idampi chaṭṭhaṁ anussatiṭṭhānaṁ dhārehi.
an6.29:11.3_1: bhikkhu satova abhikkamati satova paṭikkamati satova tiṭṭhati satova nisīdati satova seyyaṁ kappeti satova kammaṁ adhiṭṭhāti.
an6.29:11.4_0: Idaṁ, ānanda, anussatiṭṭhānaṁ evaṁ bhāvitaṁ evaṁ bahulīkataṁ satisampajaññāya saṁvattatī”ti.
an6.30:2.2_6: samaṇaṁ vā brāhmaṇaṁ vā micchādiṭṭhikaṁ micchāpaṭipannaṁ dassanāya gacchati.
an6.30:2.3_0: Atthetaṁ, bhikkhave, dassanaṁ; netaṁ natthīti vadāmi.
an6.30:2.4_2: dassanaṁ hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
an6.30:2.4_3: na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati.
an6.30:2.5_2: tathāgataṁ vā tathāgatasāvakaṁ vā dassanāya gacchati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno,
an6.30:2.5_5: dassanānaṁ sattānaṁ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya,
an6.30:2.5_6: yadidaṁ tathāgataṁ vā tathāgatasāvakaṁ vā dassanāya gacchati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno.
an6.30:3.2_6: samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā micchādiṭṭhikassa micchāpaṭipannassa dhammassavanāya gacchati.
an6.30:3.3_0: Atthetaṁ, bhikkhave, savanaṁ; netaṁ natthīti vadāmi.
an6.30:3.4_2: savanaṁ hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
an6.30:3.4_3: na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati.
an6.30:3.5_2: tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā dhammassavanāya gacchati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno,
an6.30:3.5_5: savanānaṁ sattānaṁ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya,
an6.30:3.5_6: yadidaṁ tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā dhammassavanāya gacchati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno.
an6.30:4.2_6: samaṇe vā brāhmaṇe vā micchādiṭṭhike micchāpaṭipanne saddhaṁ paṭilabhati.
an6.30:4.3_0: Attheso, bhikkhave, lābho; neso natthīti vadāmi.
an6.30:4.4_2: lābho hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito,
an6.30:4.4_3: na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati.
an6.30:4.5_2: tathāgate vā tathāgatasāvake vā saddhaṁ paṭilabhati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno,
an6.30:4.5_5: lābhānaṁ sattānaṁ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya,
an6.30:4.5_6: yadidaṁ tathāgate vā tathāgatasāvake vā saddhaṁ paṭilabhati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno.
an6.30:5.2_8: samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā micchādiṭṭhikassa micchāpaṭipannassa sikkhati.
an6.30:5.3_0: Atthesā, bhikkhave, sikkhā; nesā natthīti vadāmi.
an6.30:5.4_2: sikkhā hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasaṁhitā,
an6.30:5.4_3: na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati.
an6.30:5.5_4: adhipaññampi sikkhati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno,
an6.30:5.5_7: sikkhānaṁ sattānaṁ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya,
an6.30:6.2_6: samaṇaṁ vā brāhmaṇaṁ vā micchādiṭṭhikaṁ micchāpaṭipannaṁ paricarati.
an6.30:6.3_0: Atthesā, bhikkhave, pāricariyā; nesā natthīti vadāmi.
an6.30:6.4_2: pāricariyā hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasaṁhitā,
an6.30:6.5_2: tathāgataṁ vā tathāgatasāvakaṁ vā paricarati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno,
an6.30:6.5_5: pāricariyānaṁ sattānaṁ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya,
an6.30:6.5_6: yadidaṁ tathāgataṁ vā tathāgatasāvakaṁ vā paricarati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno.
an6.30:6.7_0: Iti dassanānuttariyaṁ, savanānuttariyaṁ, lābhānuttariyaṁ, sikkhānuttariyaṁ, pāricariyānuttariyaṁ.
an6.30:7.2_6: samaṇaṁ vā brāhmaṇaṁ vā micchādiṭṭhikaṁ micchāpaṭipannaṁ anussarati.
an6.30:7.3_0: Atthesā, bhikkhave, anussati; nesā natthīti vadāmi.
an6.30:7.4_2: anussati hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasaṁhitā,
an6.30:7.4_3: na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati.
an6.30:7.5_2: tathāgataṁ vā tathāgatasāvakaṁ vā anussarati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno,
an6.30:7.5_5: anussatīnaṁ sattānaṁ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya,
an6.30:7.5_6: yadidaṁ tathāgataṁ vā tathāgatasāvakaṁ vā anussarati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno.
an6.31:1.1_0: “Chayime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an6.31:1.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an6.31:2.1_0: Chayime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattanti.
an6.31:2.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an6.32:1.1_0: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.32:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.32:2.4_0: ime kho, bhante, cha dhammā bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an6.32:2.7_0: Atha kho sā devatā “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an6.32:3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.32:3.2_2: rattiṁ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an6.32:3.6_0: ime kho, bhante, cha dhammā bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī’ti.
an6.32:3.8_0: Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyīti.
an6.33:1.1_2: rattiṁ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an6.33:1.4_0: Satthugāravatā, dhammagāravatā, saṅghagāravatā, sikkhāgāravatā, hirigāravatā, ottappagāravatā—
an6.33:1.5_0: ime kho, bhante, cha dhammā bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī’ti.
an6.33:1.7_0: Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyīti.
an6.34:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an6.34:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
an6.34:1.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena tisso nāma bhikkhu adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṁ brahmalokaṁ upapanno hoti.
an6.34:2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya;
an6.34:2.2_0: Addasā kho tisso brahmā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
an6.34:2.4_0: “ehi kho, mārisa moggallāna; svāgataṁ, mārisa moggallāna;
an6.34:2.5_0: cirassaṁ kho, mārisa moggallāna; imaṁ pariyāyamakāsi, yadidaṁ idhāgamanāya.
an6.34:2.7_0: Nisīdi kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno paññatte āsane.
an6.34:2.8_0: Tissopi kho brahmā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an6.34:2.9_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho tissaṁ brahmānaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
an6.34:4.2_2: sabbesaṁ cātumahārājikānaṁ devānaṁ evaṁ ñāṇaṁ hoti:
an6.34:4.3_2: cātumahārājikā devā buddhe aveccappasādena asamannāgatā dhamme aveccappasādena asamannāgatā saṅghe aveccappasādena
an6.34:4.3_3: asamannāgatā ariyakantehi sīlehi asamannāgatā na tesaṁ devānaṁ evaṁ ñāṇaṁ hoti:
an6.34:4.4_4: saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgatā ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatā,
an6.34:5.1_2: ‘sotāpannā nāma avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā’ti udāhu tāvatiṁsānampi devānaṁ …pe…
an6.34:6.2_2: sabbesaṁ paranimmitavasavattīnaṁ devānaṁ evaṁ ñāṇaṁ hoti:
an6.34:6.3_6: na tesaṁ devānaṁ evaṁ ñāṇaṁ hoti:
an6.34:6.4_5: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatā tesaṁ evaṁ ñāṇaṁ hoti:
an6.34:7.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno tissassa brahmuno bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā:
an6.34:7.1_1: “seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
an6.35:1.3_0: Aniccasaññā, anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā—
an6.35:1.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammā vijjābhāgiyā”ti.
an6.36:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanāhī.
an6.36:1.4_2: bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanāhī so sattharipi agāravo viharati appatisso,
an6.36:1.5_5: sikkhāya na paripūrakārī so saṅghe vivādaṁ janeti,
an6.36:1.5_6: yo hoti vivādo bahujanāhitāya bahujanāsukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an6.36:1.6_2: vivādamūlaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā samanupasseyyātha.
an6.36:1.7_2: vivādamūlaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā na samanupasseyyātha,
an6.36:1.7_5: tasseva pāpakassa vivādamūlassa āyatiṁ anavassavāya paṭipajjeyyātha.
an6.36:1.8_1: Evametassa pāpakassa vivādamūlassa āyatiṁ anavassavo hoti.
an6.36:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu makkhī hoti paḷāsī …pe…
an6.36:2.7_2: bhikkhu satthari agāravo viharati appatisso, dhamme …
an6.36:2.7_6: yo hoti vivādo bahujanāhitāya bahujanāsukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an6.36:2.8_2: vivādamūlaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā samanupasseyyātha.
an6.36:2.9_2: vivādamūlaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā na samanupasseyyātha.
an6.36:2.9_5: tasseva pāpakassa vivādamūlassa āyatiṁ anavassavāya paṭipajjeyyātha.
an6.36:2.10_1: Evametassa pāpakassa vivādamūlassa āyatiṁ anavassavo hoti.
an6.37:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an6.37:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena veḷukaṇḍakī nandamātā upāsikā sāriputtamoggallānappamukhe bhikkhusaṅghe chaḷaṅgasamannāgataṁ dakkhiṇaṁ patiṭṭhāpeti.
an6.37:1.3_0: Addasā kho bhagavā dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena veḷukaṇḍakiṁ nandamātaraṁ upāsikaṁ
an6.37:1.5_2: veḷukaṇḍakī nandamātā upāsikā sāriputtamoggallānappamukhe bhikkhusaṅghe chaḷaṅgasamannāgataṁ dakkhiṇaṁ patiṭṭhāpeti.
an6.37:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, dāyakassa tīṇaṅgāni honti, paṭiggāhakānaṁ tīṇaṅgāni.
an6.37:2.4_0: Idha, bhikkhave, dāyako pubbeva dānā sumano hoti, dadaṁ cittaṁ pasādeti, datvā attamano hoti.
an6.37:3.2_2: paṭiggāhakā vītarāgā vā honti rāgavinayāya vā paṭipannā,
an6.37:3.2_3: vītadosā vā honti dosavinayāya vā paṭipannā,
an6.37:3.2_4: vītamohā vā honti mohavinayāya vā paṭipannā.
an6.37:3.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, chaḷaṅgasamannāgatā dakkhiṇā hoti.
an6.37:4.1_0: Evaṁ chaḷaṅgasamannāgatāya, bhikkhave, dakkhiṇāya na sukaraṁ puññassa pamāṇaṁ gahetuṁ:
an6.37:4.2_0: ‘ettako puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro sovaggiko sukhavipāko saggasaṁvattaniko iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an6.37:4.3_0: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāpuññakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an6.37:5.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde na sukaraṁ udakassa pamāṇaṁ gahetuṁ:
an6.37:5.2_0: ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakānīti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasatānīti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasahassānīti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasatasahassānī’ti vā.
an6.37:5.3_0: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an6.37:5.4_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, evaṁ chaḷaṅgasamannāgatāya dakkhiṇāya na sukaraṁ puññassa pamāṇaṁ gahetuṁ:
an6.37:5.5_0: ‘ettako puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro sovaggiko sukhavipāko saggasaṁvattaniko iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an6.37:5.6_0: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāpuññakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”ti.
an6.38:1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an6.38:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an6.38:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.38:1.5_0: “Māhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁvādiṁ evaṁdiṭṭhiṁ addasaṁ vā assosiṁ vā.
an6.38:1.6_0: Kathañhi nāma sayaṁ abhikkamanto, sayaṁ paṭikkamanto evaṁ vakkhati:
an6.38:2.1_0: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, brāhmaṇa, atthi ārabbhadhātū”ti?
an6.38:3.1_0: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, brāhmaṇa, atthi nikkamadhātu …pe…
an6.38:4.1_0: Māhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁvādiṁ evaṁdiṭṭhiṁ addasaṁ vā assosiṁ vā.
an6.38:4.2_0: Kathañhi nāma sayaṁ abhikkamanto sayaṁ paṭikkamanto evaṁ vakkhati:
an6.39:1.5_0: atha kho, bhikkhave, lobhā lobhova samudeti.
an6.39:1.7_0: atha kho, bhikkhave, dosā dosova samudeti.
an6.39:1.9_0: atha kho, bhikkhave, mohā mohova samudeti.
an6.39:1.10_2: lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena devā paññāyanti,
an6.39:1.11_2: lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena nirayo paññāyati tiracchānayoni paññāyati pettivisayo paññāyati,
an6.39:1.12_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṁ samudayāya.
an6.39:2.5_0: atha kho, bhikkhave, alobhā alobhova samudeti.
an6.39:2.7_0: atha kho, bhikkhave, adosā adosova samudeti.
an6.39:2.9_0: atha kho, bhikkhave, amohā amohova samudeti.
an6.39:2.10_2: alobhajena kammena adosajena kammena amohajena kammena nirayo paññāyati tiracchānayoni paññāyati pettivisayo paññāyati,
an6.39:2.11_2: alobhajena kammena adosajena kammena amohajena kammena devā paññāyanti,
an6.39:2.12_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṁ samudayāyā”ti.
an6.40:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kimilāyaṁ viharati niculavane.
an6.40:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā kimilo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.40:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā kimilo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.40:1.4_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti?
an6.40:1.5_1: tathāgate parinibbute bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo satthari agāravā viharanti appatissā,
an6.40:1.6_0: Ayaṁ kho, kimila, hetu ayaṁ paccayo yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti”.
an6.40:2.1_0: “Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti?
an6.40:2.2_1: tathāgate parinibbute bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo satthari sagāravā viharanti sappatissā,
an6.40:2.3_0: Ayaṁ kho, kimila, hetu ayaṁ paccayo yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti.
an6.41:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā sāriputto rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
an6.41:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ gijjhakūṭā
an6.41:1.3_1: pabbatā orohanto addasa aññatarasmiṁ padese mahantaṁ dārukkhandhaṁ.
an6.41:1.5_0: “passatha no, āvuso, tumhe amuṁ mahantaṁ dārukkhandhan”ti?
an6.41:2.1_0: “Ākaṅkhamāno, āvuso, bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto amuṁ dārukkhandhaṁ pathavītveva adhimucceyya.
an6.41:2.3_2: yaṁ nissāya bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto amuṁ dārukkhandhaṁ pathavītveva adhimucceyya.
an6.41:2.4_0: Ākaṅkhamāno, āvuso, bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto amuṁ dārukkhandhaṁ āpotveva adhimucceyya …pe…
an6.41:2.10_2: yaṁ nissāya bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto amuṁ dārukkhandhaṁ asubhantveva adhimucceyyā”ti.
an6.42:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena icchānaṅgalaṁ nāma kosalānaṁ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
an6.42:1.3_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.
an6.42:1.5_1: gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito icchānaṅgalaṁ anuppatto icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.
an6.42:1.6_0: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an6.42:1.7_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno …pe… buddho bhagavā’ti.
an6.42:1.8_0: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ …pe… arahataṁ dassanaṁ hotī”ti.
an6.42:1.9_0: Atha kho icchānaṅgalakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā tassā rattiyā accayena pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya yena icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an6.42:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nāgito bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hoti.
an6.42:2.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nāgitaṁ āmantesi:
an6.42:2.3_0: “ke pana te, nāgita, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
an6.42:2.4_1: icchānaṅgalakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā bhagavantaṁyeva uddissa bhikkhusaṅghañcā”ti.
an6.42:2.5_0: “Māhaṁ, nāgita, yasena samāgamaṁ, mā ca mayā yaso.
an6.42:2.6_1: nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī assa akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an6.42:2.6_2: yassāhaṁ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an6.42:2.7_0: so taṁ mīḷhasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ lābhasakkārasilokasukhaṁ sādiyeyyā”ti.
an6.42:3.3_2: tanninnāva bhavissanti brāhmaṇagahapatikā negamā ceva jānapadā ca.
an6.42:3.4_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante yathāninnaṁ udakāni pavattanti;
an6.42:3.5_2: tanninnāva bhavissanti brāhmaṇagahapatikā negamā ceva jānapadā ca.
an6.42:4.1_0: “Māhaṁ, nāgita, yasena samāgamaṁ, mā ca mayā yaso.
an6.42:4.2_1: nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī assa akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an6.42:4.2_2: yassāhaṁ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an6.42:4.3_0: so taṁ mīḷhasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ lābhasakkārasilokasukhaṁ sādiyeyya.
an6.42:5.1_0: Idhāhaṁ, nāgita, bhikkhuṁ passāmi gāmantavihāriṁ samāhitaṁ nisinnaṁ.
an6.42:5.3_0: ‘idānimaṁ āyasmantaṁ ārāmiko vā upaṭṭhahissati samaṇuddeso vā taṁ tamhā samādhimhā cāvessatī’ti.
an6.42:5.4_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gāmantavihārena.
an6.42:6.1_0: Idha panāhaṁ, nāgita, bhikkhuṁ passāmi āraññikaṁ araññe pacalāyamānaṁ nisinnaṁ.
an6.42:6.3_0: ‘idāni ayamāyasmā imaṁ niddākilamathaṁ paṭivinodetvā araññasaññaṁyeva manasi karissati ekattan’ti.
an6.42:6.4_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena.
an6.42:7.1_0: Idha panāhaṁ, nāgita, bhikkhuṁ passāmi āraññikaṁ araññe asamāhitaṁ nisinnaṁ.
an6.42:7.3_0: ‘idāni ayamāyasmā asamāhitaṁ vā cittaṁ samādahissati, samāhitaṁ vā cittaṁ anurakkhissatī’ti.
an6.42:7.4_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena.
an6.42:8.1_0: Idha panāhaṁ, nāgita, bhikkhuṁ passāmi āraññikaṁ araññe samāhitaṁ nisinnaṁ.
an6.42:8.3_0: ‘idāni ayamāyasmā avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimocessati, vimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ anurakkhissatī’ti.
an6.42:8.4_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena.
an6.42:9.2_0: So taṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ nikāmayamāno riñcati paṭisallānaṁ riñcati araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni;
an6.42:9.4_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gāmantavihārena.
an6.42:10.2_0: So taṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ paṭipaṇāmetvā na riñcati paṭisallānaṁ na riñcati araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni.
an6.42:10.3_0: Tenāhaṁ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena.
an6.42:11.1_1: samaye addhānamaggappaṭipanno na kañci passāmi purato vā pacchato vā, phāsu me, nāgita,
an6.43:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an6.43:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
an6.43:1.3_0: Sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
an6.43:1.5_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.43:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ yena pubbārāmo migāramātupāsādo tenupasaṅkami.
an6.43:2.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
an6.43:2.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.43:2.5_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ yena pubbakoṭṭhako tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṁ.
an6.43:2.6_0: Pubbakoṭṭhake gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
an6.43:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena rañño pasenadissa kosalassa seto nāma nāgo mahātūriyatāḷitavāditena pubbakoṭṭhakā paccuttarati.
an6.43:3.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā udāyī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.43:3.5_0: “hatthimeva nu kho, bhante, mahantaṁ brahantaṁ kāyupapannaṁ jano disvā evamāha:
an6.43:3.6_1: udāhu aññampi kañci mahantaṁ brahantaṁ kāyupapannaṁ jano disvā evamāha:
an6.43:3.7_0: “Hatthimpi kho, udāyi, mahantaṁ brahantaṁ kāyupapannaṁ jano disvā evamāha:
an6.43:3.13_0: manussampi kho, udāyi, mahantaṁ brahantaṁ kāyupapannaṁ jano disvā evamāha:
an6.43:3.15_1: yo sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya āguṁ na karoti kāyena vācāya manasā,
an6.43:4.3_1: yo sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya āguṁ na karoti kāyena vācāya manasā,
an6.43:4.4_0: Idañca panāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā subhāsitaṁ imāhi gāthāhi anumodāmi—
an6.44:1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an6.44:1.2_0: Atha kho migasālā upāsikā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an6.44:1.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an6.44:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho migasālā upāsikā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
an6.44:2.1_3: yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyaṁ?
an6.44:2.2_0: Pitā me, bhante, purāṇo brahmacārī ahosi ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an6.44:2.3_0: So kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmī satto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapannoti.
an6.44:2.4_0: Petteyyopi me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacārī ahosi sadārasantuṭṭho.
an6.44:2.5_0: Sopi kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmipatto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapannoti.
an6.44:2.6_3: yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyan”ti?
an6.44:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando migasālāya upāsikāya nivesane piṇḍapātaṁ gahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an6.44:3.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.44:3.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.44:4.1_1: pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁ;
an6.44:4.3_3: yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyaṁ.
an6.44:4.4_0: Pitā me, bhante, purāṇo brahmacārī ahosi ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an6.44:4.5_0: So kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmipatto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapannoti.
an6.44:4.6_0: Petteyyopi me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacārī ahosi sadārasantuṭṭho.
an6.44:4.7_0: Sopi kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmipatto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapannoti.
an6.44:4.8_3: yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyan’ti?
an6.44:4.9_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, migasālaṁ upāsikaṁ etadavocaṁ:
an6.44:5.1_0: “Kā cānanda, migasālā upāsikā bālā abyattā ammakā ammakapaññā, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariyañāṇe?
an6.44:5.2_0: Chayime, ānanda, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an6.44:6.2_0: Idhānanda, ekacco puggalo sorato hoti sukhasaṁvāso, abhinandanti sabrahmacārī ekattavāsena.
an6.44:6.4_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā hānāya pareti no visesāya, hānagāmīyeva hoti no visesagāmī.
an6.44:7.1_0: Idha panānanda, ekacco puggalo sorato hoti sukhasaṁvāso, abhinandanti sabrahmacārī ekattavāsena.
an6.44:7.3_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā visesāya pareti no hānāya, visesagāmīyeva hoti no hānagāmī.
an6.44:8.2_0: ‘imassapi teva dhammā aparassapi teva dhammā, kasmā tesaṁ eko hīno eko paṇīto’ti.
an6.44:8.3_0: Tañhi tesaṁ, ānanda, hoti dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
an6.44:9.2_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, puggalo amunā purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an6.44:9.9_0: Ahaṁ vā, ānanda, puggalesu pamāṇaṁ gaṇheyyaṁ, yo vā panassa mādiso.
an6.44:10.3_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā hānāya pareti no visesāya, hānagāmīyeva hoti no visesagāmī.
an6.44:13.2_0: Tassa savanenapi akataṁ hoti …pe… sāmāyikampi vimuttiṁ na labhati.
an6.44:13.3_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā hānāya pareti no visesāya, hānagāmīyeva hoti no visesagāmī.
an6.44:14.3_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā visesāya pareti no hānāya, visesagāmīyeva hoti no hānagāmī.
an6.44:15.2_0: ‘imassapi teva dhammā, aparassapi teva dhammā. Kasmā tesaṁ eko hīno, eko paṇīto’ti?
an6.44:15.3_0: Tañhi tesaṁ, ānanda, hoti dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
an6.44:16.2_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, puggalo amunā purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an6.44:16.9_0: Ahaṁ vā, ānanda, puggalesu pamāṇaṁ gaṇheyyaṁ, yo vā panassa mādiso.
an6.44:17.1_0: Kā cānanda, migasālā upāsikā bālā abyattā ammakā ammakapaññā, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariyañāṇe.
an6.44:17.2_0: Ime kho, ānanda, cha puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an6.44:18.3_0: Iti kho, ānanda, ime puggalā ubho ekaṅgahīnā”ti.
an6.45:3.1_2: daliddo assako anāḷhiko iṇaṁ ādiyitvā vaḍḍhiṁ paṭissuṇāti, vaḍḍhipi,
an6.45:4.1_2: daliddo assako anāḷhiko vaḍḍhiṁ paṭissuṇitvā kālābhataṁ vaḍḍhiṁ na deti,
an6.45:5.1_0: “Yampi, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anāḷhiko codiyamāno na deti, anucarantipi naṁ;
an6.45:6.1_0: “Yampi, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anāḷhiko anucariyamāno na deti, bandhantipi naṁ;
an6.45:7.2_2: yassa kassaci saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu,
an6.45:7.3_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye daliddo assako anāḷhiko.
an6.45:8.1_2: daliddo assako anāḷhiko saddhāya asati kusalesu dhammesu,
an6.45:9.1_0: So tassa kāyaduccaritassa paṭicchādanahetu pāpikaṁ icchaṁ paṇidahati.
an6.45:11.1_0: Tamenaṁ araññagataṁ vā rukkhamūlagataṁ vā suññāgāragataṁ vā vippaṭisārasahagatā pāpakā akusalavitakkā samudācaranti.
an6.45:12.1_2: daliddo assako anāḷhiko kāyena duccaritaṁ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṁ caritvā manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā
an6.45:12.1_3: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā nirayabandhane vā bajjhati tiracchānayonibandhane vā.
an6.45:12.2_2: aññaṁ ekabandhanampi samanupassāmi evaṁdāruṇaṁ evaṅkaṭukaṁ evaṁantarāyakaraṁ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya,
an6.46:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā mahācundo cetīsu viharati sayaṁjātiyaṁ.
an6.46:1.3_0: Tatra kho āyasmā mahācundo bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.46:1.5_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahācundassa paccassosuṁ.
an6.46:2.2_0: ‘ime pana jhāyinomhā, jhāyinomhāti jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti avajjhāyanti.
an6.46:2.3_0: Kimime jhāyanti, kintime jhāyanti, kathaṁ ime jhāyantī’ti?
an6.46:2.4_2: na ca bahujanahitāya paṭipannā honti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an6.46:3.1_0: Idha panāvuso, jhāyī bhikkhū dhammayoge bhikkhū apasādenti:
an6.46:3.2_1: dhammayogamhāti uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā pākatindriyā.
an6.46:3.3_0: Kimime dhammayogā, kintime dhammayogā, kathaṁ ime dhammayogā’ti?
an6.46:3.4_2: na ca bahujanahitāya paṭipannā honti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an6.46:4.1_1: dhammayogā bhikkhū dhammayogānaññeva bhikkhūnaṁ vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanti,
an6.46:4.2_2: na ca bahujanahitāya paṭipannā honti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an6.46:5.1_1: jhāyī bhikkhū jhāyīnaññeva bhikkhūnaṁ vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanti,
an6.46:5.2_2: na ca bahujanahitāya paṭipannā honti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an6.46:6.5_0: Acchariyā hete, āvuso, puggalā dullabhā lokasmiṁ, ye amataṁ dhātuṁ kāyena phusitvā viharanti.
an6.46:7.5_1: puggalā dullabhā lokasmiṁ ye gambhīraṁ atthapadaṁ paññāya ativijjha passantī”ti.
an6.47:1.1_0: Atha kho moḷiyasīvako paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.47:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an6.47:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho moḷiyasīvako paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.47:1.4_1: sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī”ti?
an6.47:2.1_0: “Tena hi, sīvaka, taññevettha paṭipucchāmi. Yathā te khameyya tathā naṁ byākareyyāsi.

an6.47:2.6_0: evampi kho, sīvaka, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti …pe….

an6.47:3.6_1: asantaṁ vā ajjhattaṁ mohadhammaṁ ‘natthi me ajjhattaṁ mohadhammo’ti pajānāsī”ti?
an6.47:3.8_1: santaṁ vā ajjhattaṁ mohadhammaṁ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṁ mohadhammo’ti pajānāsi,
an6.47:3.8_2: asantaṁ vā ajjhattaṁ mohadhammaṁ ‘natthi me ajjhattaṁ mohadhammo’ti pajānāsi—

an6.48:1.3_0: “‘sandiṭṭhiko dhammo, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo’ti, bho gotama, vuccati.
