an6.49:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an6.49:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca khemo āyasmā ca sumano sāvatthiyaṁ viharanti andhavanasmiṁ.
an6.49:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca khemo āyasmā ca sumano yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an6.49:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā khemo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.49:2.1_1: bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto tassa na evaṁ hoti:
an6.49:2.2_0: ‘atthi me seyyoti vā atthi me sadisoti vā atthi me hīnoti vā’”ti.
an6.49:2.5_0: Atha kho āyasmā khemo “samanuñño me satthā”ti uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
an6.49:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sumano acirapakkante āyasmante kheme bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.49:3.2_1: bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto tassa na evaṁ hoti:
an6.49:3.3_0: ‘natthi me seyyoti vā natthi me sadisoti vā natthi me hīnoti vā’”ti.
an6.49:3.6_0: Atha kho āyasmā sumano “samanuñño me satthā”ti uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
an6.49:4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkantesu āyasmante ca kheme āyasmante ca sumane bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.49:4.3_0: Attho ca vutto attā ca anupanīto.
an6.49:4.4_0: Atha ca pana idhekacce moghapurisā hasamānakā maññe aññaṁ byākaronti.
an6.50:1.1_0: “Indriyasaṁvare, bhikkhave, asati indriyasaṁvaravipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti sīlaṁ;
an6.50:1.2_0: sīle asati sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi;
an6.50:1.3_0: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ;
an6.50:1.4_0: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an6.50:1.5_0: nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an6.50:1.8_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, indriyasaṁvare asati indriyasaṁvaravipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti sīlaṁ …pe…
an6.50:2.1_0: Indriyasaṁvare, bhikkhave, sati indriyasaṁvarasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti sīlaṁ;
an6.50:2.2_0: sīle sati sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi;
an6.50:2.3_0: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ;
an6.50:2.4_0: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an6.50:2.5_0: nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an6.50:2.7_2: indriyasaṁvare sati indriyasaṁvarasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti sīlaṁ …pe…
an6.51:1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
an6.51:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an6.51:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an6.51:2.1_3: sutā cassa dhammā na sammosaṁ gacchanti,
an6.51:2.1_4: ye cassa dhammā pubbe cetasā samphuṭṭhapubbā te ca samudācaranti,
an6.51:2.4_0: “Tenahāvuso sāriputta, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
an6.51:2.5_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.
an6.51:3.2_0: suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ gāthaṁ udānaṁ itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ vedallaṁ.
an6.51:3.3_0: So yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti,
an6.51:3.3_1: yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ vāceti,
an6.51:3.3_2: yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti,
an6.51:3.3_3: yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
an6.51:3.4_0: Yasmiṁ āvāse therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā tasmiṁ āvāse vassaṁ upeti.
an6.51:3.5_0: Te kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati:
an6.51:3.7_2: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ paṭivinodenti.
an6.51:3.8_3: sutā cassa dhammā na sammosaṁ gacchanti,
an6.51:3.8_4: ye cassa dhammā pubbe cetasā samphuṭṭhapubbā te ca samudācaranti,
an6.51:4.1_0: “Acchariyaṁ, āvuso, abbhutaṁ, āvuso, yāva subhāsitañcidaṁ āyasmatā ānandena.
an6.51:4.2_0: Imehi ca mayaṁ chahi dhammehi samannāgataṁ āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ dhārema.
an6.51:4.4_0: suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ gāthaṁ udānaṁ itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ vedallaṁ.
an6.51:4.5_0: Āyasmā ānando yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti,
an6.51:4.5_1: āyasmā ānando yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ vāceti,
an6.51:4.5_2: āyasmā ānando yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti,
an6.51:4.5_3: āyasmā ānando yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
an6.51:4.6_0: Āyasmā ānando yasmiṁ āvāse therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā tasmiṁ āvāse vassaṁ upeti.
an6.51:4.7_0: Te āyasmā ānando kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati:
an6.51:4.9_2: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ paṭivinodentī”ti.
an6.52:1.1_0: Atha kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an6.52:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an6.52:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.52:2.1_0: “Khattiyā, bho gotama, kiṁadhippāyā, kiṁupavicārā, kiṁadhiṭṭhānā, kiṁabhinivesā, kiṁpariyosānā”ti?
an6.52:5.1_0: “Itthī pana, bho gotama, kiṁadhippāyā, kiṁupavicārā, kiṁadhiṭṭhānā, kiṁabhinivesā, kiṁpariyosānā”ti?
an6.52:6.1_0: “Corā pana, bho gotama, kiṁadhippāyā, kiṁupavicārā, kiṁadhiṭṭhānā, kiṁabhinivesā, kiṁpariyosānā”ti?
an6.52:8.2_0: Khattiyānampi bhavaṁ gotamo jānāti adhippāyañca upavicārañca adhiṭṭhānañca abhinivesañca pariyosānañca.
an6.52:8.2_5: samaṇānampi bhavaṁ gotamo jānāti adhippāyañca upavicārañca adhiṭṭhānañca abhinivesañca pariyosānañca.
an6.52:8.4_0: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an6.53:1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an6.53:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an6.53:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.53:2.1_2: eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ,
an6.53:2.2_1: eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ,
an6.53:3.1_2: eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ,
an6.53:3.2_1: eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ,
an6.53:4.2_1: appamādo eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ,
an6.53:5.1_1: kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo sabbā tā kūṭaṅgamā kūṭaninnā kūṭasamosaraṇā,
an6.53:6.1_0: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, pabbajalāyako pabbajaṁ lāyitvā agge gahetvā odhunāti nidhunāti nicchādeti;
an6.53:7.1_1: ambapiṇḍiyā vaṇṭacchinnāya yāni kānici ambāni vaṇṭūpanibandhanāni sabbāni tāni tadanvayāni bhavanti;
an6.53:8.1_1: ye keci khuddarājāno sabbete rañño cakkavattissa anuyantā bhavanti,
an6.53:9.1_1: yā kāci tārakarūpānaṁ pabhā sabbā tā candassa pabhāya kalaṁ nāgghanti soḷasiṁ,
an6.53:9.2_1: appamādo eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ yo ca attho samparāyiko.
an6.53:10.1_1: eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṁ,
an6.53:11.2_0: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an6.54:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
an6.54:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā dhammiko jātibhūmiyaṁ āvāsiko hoti sabbaso jātibhūmiyaṁ sattasu āvāsesu.
an6.54:1.3_0: Tatra sudaṁ āyasmā dhammiko āgantuke bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati vihiṁsati vitudati roseti vācāya.
an6.54:1.4_0: Te ca āgantukā bhikkhū āyasmatā dhammikena akkosiyamānā paribhāsiyamānā vihesiyamānā vitudiyamānā rosiyamānā vācāya pakkamanti,
an6.54:2.3_0: Atha ca pana āgantukā bhikkhū pakkamanti, na saṇṭhanti, riñcanti āvāsaṁ.
an6.54:2.4_0: Ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena āgantukā bhikkhū pakkamanti, na saṇṭhanti, riñcanti āvāsan”ti?
an6.54:2.6_0: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā dhammiko āgantuke bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati vihiṁsati vitudati roseti vācāya.
an6.54:2.7_0: Te ca āgantukā bhikkhū āyasmatā dhammikena akkosiyamānā paribhāsiyamānā vihesiyamānā vitudiyamānā rosiyamānā vācāya pakkamanti,
an6.54:3.1_0: Atha kho jātibhūmakā upāsakā yena āyasmā dhammiko tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an6.54:3.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā dhammiko tamhā āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
an6.54:3.5_0: Tatrapi sudaṁ āyasmā dhammiko āgantuke bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati vihiṁsati vitudati roseti vācāya.
an6.54:3.6_0: Te ca āgantukā bhikkhū āyasmatā dhammikena akkosiyamānā paribhāsiyamānā vihesiyamānā vitudiyamānā rosiyamānā vācāya pakkamanti,
an6.54:4.3_0: Atha ca pana āgantukā bhikkhū pakkamanti, na saṇṭhanti, riñcanti āvāsaṁ.
an6.54:4.4_0: Ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena āgantukā bhikkhū pakkamanti, na saṇṭhanti, riñcanti āvāsan”ti?
an6.54:4.6_0: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā dhammiko āgantuke bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati vihiṁsati vitudati roseti vācāya.
an6.54:4.7_0: Te ca āgantukā bhikkhū āyasmatā dhammikena akkosiyamānā paribhāsiyamānā vihesiyamānā vitudiyamānā rosiyamānā vācāya pakkamanti,
an6.54:5.1_0: Atha kho jātibhūmakā upāsakā yenāyasmā dhammiko tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an6.54:5.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā dhammiko tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
an6.54:5.5_0: Tatrapi sudaṁ āyasmā dhammiko āgantuke bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati vihiṁsati vitudati roseti vācāya.
an6.54:5.6_0: Te ca āgantukā bhikkhū āyasmatā dhammikena akkosiyamānā paribhāsiyamānā vihesiyamānā vitudiyamānā rosiyamānā vācāya pakkamanti,
an6.54:6.3_0: Atha ca pana āgantukā bhikkhū pakkamanti, na saṇṭhanti, riñcanti āvāsaṁ.
an6.54:6.4_0: Ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena āgantukā bhikkhū pakkamanti, na saṇṭhanti, riñcanti āvāsan”ti?
an6.54:6.5_1: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā dhammiko āgantuke bhikkhū akkosati …pe….
an6.54:6.6_0: Yannūna mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ dhammikaṁ pabbājeyyāma sabbaso jātibhūmiyaṁ sattahi āvāsehī”ti.
an6.54:6.7_0: Atha kho jātibhūmakā upāsakā yenāyasmā dhammiko tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an6.54:6.8_0: “pakkamatu, bhante, āyasmā dhammiko sabbaso jātibhūmiyaṁ sattahi āvāsehī”ti.
an6.54:6.10_0: “pabbājito khomhi jātibhūmakehi upāsakehi sabbaso jātibhūmiyaṁ sattahi āvāsehi.
an6.54:7.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā dhammiko pattacīvaramādāya yena rājagahaṁ tena pakkāmi.
an6.54:7.2_0: Anupubbena yena rājagahaṁ gijjhakūṭo pabbato yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.54:7.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ dhammikaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an6.54:7.3_0: “handa kuto nu tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, āgacchasī”ti?
an6.54:7.4_0: “Pabbājito ahaṁ, bhante, jātibhūmakehi upāsakehi sabbaso jātibhūmiyaṁ sattahi āvāsehī”ti.
an6.54:7.5_4: so tvaṁ tato tato pabbājito mameva santike āgacchasi.
an6.54:8.1_2: sāmuddikā vāṇijā tīradassiṁ sakuṇaṁ gahetvā nāvāya samuddaṁ ajjhogāhanti.
an6.54:8.2_0: Te atīradakkhiṇiyā nāvāya tīradassiṁ sakuṇaṁ muñcanti.
an6.54:8.4_0: Sace so samantā tīraṁ passati, tathāgatakova hoti.
an6.54:8.5_0: Sace pana so samantā tīraṁ na passati tameva nāvaṁ paccāgacchati.
an6.54:8.6_2: yaṁ taṁ tato tato pabbājenti so tvaṁ tato tato pabbājito mameva santike āgacchasi.
an6.54:9.1_2: rañño korabyassa suppatiṭṭho nāma nigrodharājā ahosi pañcasākho sītacchāyo manoramo.
an6.54:9.3_0: Suppatiṭṭhassa kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, nigrodharājassa tāva mahantāni phalāni ahesuṁ;
an6.54:9.7_2: nigrodharājassa ekaṁ khandhaṁ rājā paribhuñjati saddhiṁ itthāgārena,
an6.54:9.8_3: na ca sudaṁ aññamaññassa phalāni hiṁsanti.
an6.54:10.1_2: aññataro puriso suppatiṭṭhassa nigrodharājassa yāvadatthaṁ phalāni bhakkhitvā sākhaṁ bhañjitvā pakkāmi.
an6.54:10.2_0: Atha kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, suppatiṭṭhe nigrodharāje adhivatthāya devatāya etadahosi:
an6.54:10.4_1: yatra hi nāma suppatiṭṭhassa nigrodharājassa yāvadatthaṁ phalāni bhakkhitvā sākhaṁ bhañjitvā pakkamissati,
an6.54:10.4_2: yannūna suppatiṭṭho nigrodharājā āyatiṁ phalaṁ na dadeyyā’ti.
an6.54:10.5_0: Atha kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, suppatiṭṭho nigrodharājā āyatiṁ phalaṁ na adāsi.
an6.54:11.1_2: rājā korabyo yena sakko devānamindo tenupasaṅkami;
an6.54:11.2_0: ‘yagghe, mārisa, jāneyyāsi suppatiṭṭho nigrodharājā phalaṁ na detī’ti.
an6.54:11.3_3: yathā bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā suppatiṭṭhaṁ nigrodharājaṁ pavattesi ummūlamakāsi.
an6.54:11.4_2: suppatiṭṭhe nigrodharāje adhivatthā devatā dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
an6.54:12.1_2: sakko devānamindo yena suppatiṭṭhe nigrodharāje adhivatthā devatā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.54:12.1_3: upasaṅkamitvā suppatiṭṭhe nigrodharāje adhivatthaṁ devataṁ etadavoca:
an6.54:12.2_0: ‘kiṁ nu tvaṁ, devate, dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā ekamantaṁ ṭhitā’ti?
an6.54:12.3_0: ‘Tathā hi pana me, mārisa, bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā bhavanaṁ pavattesi ummūlamakāsī’ti.
an6.54:12.4_1: rukkhadhamme ṭhitāya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā bhavanaṁ pavattesi ummūlamakāsī’ti?
an6.54:12.5_0: ‘Kathaṁ pana, mārisa, rukkho rukkhadhamme ṭhito hotī’ti?
an6.54:12.7_0: Na ca tena devatāya anattamanatā vā anabhinandi vā karaṇīyā.
an6.54:12.8_0: Evaṁ kho, devate, rukkho rukkhadhamme ṭhito hotī’ti.
an6.54:12.9_1: rukkhadhamme bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā bhavanaṁ pavattesi ummūlamakāsī’ti.
an6.54:12.10_0: ‘Sace kho tvaṁ, devate, rukkhadhamme tiṭṭheyyāsi, siyā te bhavanaṁ yathāpure’ti.
an6.54:12.11_0: ‘Ṭhassāmahaṁ, mārisa, rukkhadhamme, hotu me bhavanaṁ yathāpure’ti.
an6.54:13.1_3: yathā bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā suppatiṭṭhaṁ nigrodharājaṁ ussāpesi,
an6.54:13.2_2: api nu taṁ samaṇadhamme ṭhitaṁ jātibhūmakā upāsakā pabbājesuṁ sabbaso jātibhūmiyaṁ sattahi āvāsehī”ti?
an6.54:13.3_0: “Kathaṁ pana, bhante, samaṇo samaṇadhamme ṭhito hotī”ti?
an6.54:13.5_0: Evaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, samaṇo samaṇadhamme ṭhito hotī”ti.
an6.54:13.6_1: samaṇadhamme jātibhūmakā upāsakā pabbājesuṁ sabbaso jātibhūmiyaṁ sattahi āvāsehī”ti.
an6.54:13.7_0: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, sunetto nāma satthā ahosi titthakaro kāmesu vītarāgo.
an6.54:13.8_0: Sunettassa kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, satthuno anekāni sāvakasatāni ahesuṁ.
an6.54:13.9_0: Sunetto satthā sāvakānaṁ brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ desesi.
an6.54:13.10_2: sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ desentassa cittāni na pasādesuṁ te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ
an6.54:13.10_3: maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjiṁsu.
an6.54:13.11_2: sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ desentassa cittāni pasādesuṁ te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjiṁsu.
an6.54:14.1_0: Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, mūgapakkho nāma satthā ahosi …pe…
an6.54:18.1_0: … Jotipālo nāma satthā ahosi titthakaro kāmesu vītarāgo.
an6.54:18.2_0: Jotipālassa kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, satthuno anekāni sāvakasatāni ahesuṁ.
an6.54:18.3_0: Jotipālo satthā sāvakānaṁ brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ desesi.
an6.54:18.4_2: jotipālassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ desentassa cittāni na pasādesuṁ te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ
an6.54:18.4_3: maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjiṁsu.
an6.54:18.5_2: jotipālassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ desentassa cittāni pasādesuṁ te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjiṁsu.
an6.54:19.2_0: yo ime cha satthāre titthakare kāmesu vītarāge,
an6.54:19.4_2: ime cha satthāre titthakare kāmesu vītarāge anekasataparivāre sasāvakasaṅghe paduṭṭhacitto akkoseyya paribhāseyya,
an6.54:19.5_0: Yo ekaṁ diṭṭhisampannaṁ puggalaṁ paduṭṭhacitto akkosati paribhāsati,
an6.54:19.7_0: Nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, ito bahiddhā evarūpiṁ khantiṁ vadāmi, yathāmaṁ sabrahmacārīsu.
an6.55:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
an6.55:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā soṇo rājagahe viharati sītavanasmiṁ.
an6.55:1.4_0: Atha kho āyasmato soṇassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
an6.55:1.5_0: “ye kho keci bhagavato sāvakā āraddhavīriyā viharanti, ahaṁ tesaṁ aññataro.
an6.55:1.6_0: Atha ca pana me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati,
an6.55:1.6_1: saṁvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogā,
an6.55:1.6_2: sakkā bhogā ca bhuñjituṁ puññāni ca kātuṁ.
an6.55:1.7_0: Yannūnāhaṁ sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjeyyaṁ puññāni ca kareyyan”ti.
an6.55:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato soṇassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
an6.55:2.1_2: evamevaṁ kho—gijjhakūṭe pabbate antarahito sītavane āyasmato soṇassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
an6.55:2.3_0: Āyasmāpi kho soṇo bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an6.55:2.4_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ soṇaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an6.55:3.1_0: “Nanu te, soṇa, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
an6.55:3.2_0: ‘ye kho keci bhagavato sāvakā āraddhavīriyā viharanti, ahaṁ tesaṁ aññataro.
an6.55:3.3_0: Atha ca pana me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati,
an6.55:3.3_1: saṁvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogā,
an6.55:3.3_2: sakkā bhogā ca bhuñjituṁ puññāni ca kātuṁ.
an6.55:3.4_0: Yannūnāhaṁ sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjeyyaṁ puññāni ca kareyyan’”ti?
an6.55:4.2_0: kusalo tvaṁ pubbe agāriyabhūto vīṇāya tantissare”ti?
an6.55:4.4_1: yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo accāyatā honti,
an6.55:4.4_2: api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vā”ti?
an6.55:5.1_1: yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo atisithilā honti,
an6.55:5.1_2: api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vā”ti?
an6.55:6.1_1: vīṇāya tantiyo na accāyatā honti nātisithilā same guṇe patiṭṭhitā,
an6.55:6.1_2: api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vā”ti?
an6.55:7.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā soṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.55:7.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ soṇaṁ iminā ovādena ovaditvā—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
an6.55:7.4_2: evamevaṁ kho—sītavane antarahito gijjhakūṭe pabbate pāturahosi.
an6.55:8.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā soṇo aparena samayena vīriyasamathaṁ adhiṭṭhāsi,
an6.55:8.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā soṇo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anāgāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
an6.55:8.2_1: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an6.55:8.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
an6.55:8.4_0: Aññataro ca panāyasmā soṇo arahataṁ ahosi.
an6.55:9.1_0: Atha kho āyasmato soṇassa arahattappattassa etadahosi:
an6.55:9.2_0: “yannūnāhaṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkameyyaṁ; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike aññaṁ byākareyyan”ti.
an6.55:9.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā soṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.55:9.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā soṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.55:10.1_1: bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto,
an6.55:11.1_0: Siyā kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa āyasmato evamassa:
an6.55:11.3_0: Na kho panetaṁ, bhante, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an6.55:11.4_1: bhikkhu vusitavā katakaraṇīyo karaṇīyaṁ attano asamanupassanto katassa vā paṭicayaṁ khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā nekkhammādhimutto hoti,
an6.55:12.1_0: Siyā kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa āyasmato evamassa:
an6.55:12.3_0: Na kho panetaṁ, bhante, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an6.55:12.4_1: bhikkhu vusitavā katakaraṇīyo karaṇīyaṁ attano asamanupassanto katassa vā paṭicayaṁ khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā pavivekādhimutto hoti,
an6.55:13.1_0: Siyā kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa āyasmato evamassa:
an6.55:13.3_0: Na kho panetaṁ, bhante, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an6.55:13.4_1: bhikkhu vusitavā katakaraṇīyo karaṇīyaṁ attano asamanupassanto katassa vā paṭicayaṁ khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā abyāpajjādhimutto hoti,
an6.55:17.1_1: bhikkhuno bhusā cepi cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchanti,
an6.55:17.2_0: Amissīkatamevassa cittaṁ hoti ṭhitaṁ āneñjappattaṁ vayañcassānupassati.
an6.55:17.7_0: manoviññeyyā dhammā manassa āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṁ pariyādiyanti.
an6.55:17.8_0: Amissīkatamevassa cittaṁ hoti ṭhitaṁ āneñjappattaṁ vayañcassānupassati.
an6.55:17.9_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, selo pabbato acchiddo asusiro ekagghano.
an6.55:17.10_0: Atha puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi neva naṁ saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya,
an6.55:17.10_1: atha pacchimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi …
an6.55:17.11_0: atha uttarāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi …
an6.55:17.12_0: atha dakkhiṇāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi neva naṁ saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya;
an6.55:17.13_1: evaṁ sammāvimuttacittassa bhikkhuno bhusā cepi cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchanti,
an6.55:17.14_0: Amissīkatamevassa cittaṁ hoti, ṭhitaṁ āneñjappattaṁ vayañcassānupassati.
an6.55:17.19_0: manoviññeyyā dhammā manassa āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, nevassa cittaṁ pariyādiyanti.
an6.55:17.20_0: Amissīkatamevassa cittaṁ hoti ṭhitaṁ āneñjappattaṁ vayañcassānupassatīti.
an6.56:1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā phagguno ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
an6.56:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.56:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.56:1.4_0: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā yenāyasmā phagguno tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
an6.56:1.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā phagguno tenupasaṅkami.
an6.56:1.7_0: Addasā kho āyasmā phagguno bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
an6.56:1.9_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ phaggunaṁ etadavoca:
an6.56:1.11_0: Santimāni āsanāni parehi paññattāni, tatthāhaṁ nisīdissāmī”ti.
an6.56:1.13_0: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ phaggunaṁ etadavoca:
an6.56:3.1_1: balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya;
an6.56:4.1_1: balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīsaveṭhanaṁ dadeyya;
an6.56:5.1_1: dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṁ parikanteyya;
an6.56:6.1_1: dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṁ purisaṁ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṁ samparitāpeyyuṁ;
an6.56:6.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ phaggunaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an6.56:7.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā phagguno acirapakkantassa bhagavato kālamakāsi.
an6.56:7.2_0: Tamhi cassa samaye maraṇakāle indriyāni vippasīdiṁsu.
an6.56:7.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.56:7.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.56:7.5_0: Tamhi cassa samaye maraṇakāle indriyāni vippasīdiṁsū”ti.
an6.56:8.1_0: “Kiṁ hānanda, phaggunassa bhikkhuno indriyāni na vippasīdissanti.
an6.56:8.2_0: Phaggunassa, ānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ avimuttaṁ ahosi.
an6.56:8.3_0: Tassa taṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ vimuttaṁ.
an6.56:9.1_0: Chayime, ānanda, ānisaṁsā kālena dhammassavane kālena atthupaparikkhāya.
an6.56:9.3_0: Idhānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ avimuttaṁ hoti.
an6.56:9.4_0: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle labhati tathāgataṁ dassanāya.
an6.56:9.5_0: Tassa tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
an6.56:9.6_0: Tassa taṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ vimuccati.
an6.56:9.7_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, paṭhamo ānisaṁso kālena dhammassavane.
an6.56:10.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ avimuttaṁ hoti.
an6.56:10.2_0: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle na heva kho labhati tathāgataṁ dassanāya,
an6.56:10.2_1: api ca kho tathāgatasāvakaṁ labhati dassanāya.
an6.56:10.3_0: Tassa tathāgatasāvako dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
an6.56:10.4_0: Tassa taṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ vimuccati.
an6.56:10.5_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, dutiyo ānisaṁso kālena dhammassavane.
an6.56:11.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ avimuttaṁ hoti.
an6.56:11.2_0: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle na heva kho labhati tathāgataṁ dassanāya,
an6.56:11.3_0: api ca kho yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
an6.56:11.4_0: Tassa yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato manasānupekkhato pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ vimuccati.
an6.56:11.5_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, tatiyo ānisaṁso kālena atthupaparikkhāya.
an6.56:12.1_1: bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ vimuttaṁ hoti,
an6.56:12.1_2: anuttare ca kho upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṁ avimuttaṁ hoti.
an6.56:12.2_0: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle labhati tathāgataṁ dassanāya.
an6.56:12.3_0: Tassa tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ …pe… brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
an6.56:12.4_0: Tassa taṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṁ vimuccati.
an6.56:12.5_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, catuttho ānisaṁso kālena dhammassavane.
an6.56:13.1_1: bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ vimuttaṁ hoti,
an6.56:13.1_2: anuttare ca kho upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṁ avimuttaṁ hoti.
an6.56:13.2_0: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle na heva kho labhati tathāgataṁ dassanāya,
an6.56:13.2_1: api ca kho tathāgatasāvakaṁ labhati dassanāya.
an6.56:13.3_0: Tassa tathāgatasāvako dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ …pe… parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
an6.56:13.4_0: Tassa taṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṁ vimuccati.
an6.56:13.5_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, pañcamo ānisaṁso kālena dhammassavane.
an6.56:14.1_1: bhikkhuno pañcahi orambhāgiyehi saṁyojanehi cittaṁ vimuttaṁ hoti,
an6.56:14.1_2: anuttare ca kho upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṁ avimuttaṁ hoti.
an6.56:14.2_0: So tamhi samaye maraṇakāle na heva kho labhati tathāgataṁ dassanāya,
an6.56:14.3_0: api ca kho yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
an6.56:14.4_0: Tassa yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato manasānupekkhato anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye cittaṁ vimuccati.
an6.56:14.5_0: Ayaṁ, ānanda, chaṭṭho ānisaṁso kālena atthupaparikkhāya.
an6.56:15.1_0: Ime kho, ānanda, cha ānisaṁsā kālena dhammassavane kālena atthupaparikkhāyā”ti.
an6.57:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
an6.57:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.57:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.57:2.1_2: orabbhikā sūkarikā sākuṇikā māgavikā luddā macchaghātakā corā coraghātakā bandhanāgārikā ye vā panaññepi keci kurūrakammantā.
an6.57:3.1_2: bhikkhū kaṇṭakavuttikā ye vā panaññepi keci kammavādā kriyavādā.
an6.57:4.1_0: Tatridaṁ, bhante, pūraṇena kassapena lohitābhijāti paññattā, nigaṇṭhā ekasāṭakā.
an6.57:5.1_0: Tatridaṁ, bhante, pūraṇena kassapena haliddābhijāti paññattā, gihī odātavasanā acelakasāvakā.
an6.57:6.1_0: Tatridaṁ, bhante, pūraṇena kassapena sukkābhijāti paññattā, ājīvakā ājīvakiniyo.
an6.57:7.1_2: nando vaccho kiso saṅkicco makkhali gosālo.
an6.57:8.1_0: Pūraṇena, bhante, kassapena imā chaḷabhijātiyo paññattā”ti.
an6.57:9.1_0: “Kiṁ panānanda, pūraṇassa kassapassa sabbo loko etadabbhanujānāti imā chaḷabhijātiyo paññāpetun”ti?
an6.57:9.4_1: pūraṇena kassapena appaṭiññāya etesaṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ imā chaḷabhijātiyo paññattā,
an6.57:9.4_2: yathā taṁ bālena abyattena akhettaññunā akusalena.
an6.57:10.2_0: Taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
an6.57:10.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.57:10.6_0: Idhānanda, ekacco kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno kaṇhaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:10.7_0: Idha panānanda, ekacco kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno sukkaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:10.8_0: Idha panānanda, ekacco kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:10.9_0: Idha panānanda, ekacco sukkābhijātiyo samāno kaṇhaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:10.10_0: Idha panānanda, ekacco sukkābhijātiyo samāno sukkaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:10.11_0: Idha panānanda, ekacco sukkābhijātiyo samāno akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:11.1_0: Kathañcānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno kaṇhaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati?
an6.57:11.2_1: ekacco nīce kule paccājāto hoti—caṇḍālakule vā nesādakule vā venakule vā rathakārakule vā pukkusakule vā,
an6.57:11.3_0: So ca hoti dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimako bavhābādho kāṇo vā kuṇī vā khañjo vā pakkhahato vā,
an6.57:11.3_1: na lābhī annassa pānassa vatthassa yānassa mālāgandhavilepanassa seyyāvasathapadīpeyyassa.
an6.57:11.4_0: So kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
an6.57:11.5_2: manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an6.57:11.6_0: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno kaṇhaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:12.1_0: Kathañcānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno sukkaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati?
an6.57:12.2_0: Idhānanda, ekacco nīce kule paccājāto hoti—caṇḍālakule vā …pe…
an6.57:12.4_0: So kāyena sucaritaṁ carati, vācāya sucaritaṁ carati, manasā sucaritaṁ carati.
an6.57:12.5_2: manasā sucaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an6.57:12.6_0: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno sukkaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:13.1_0: Kathañcānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati?
an6.57:13.2_0: Idhānanda, ekacco nīce kule paccājāto hoti—caṇḍālakule vā …pe…
an6.57:13.3_0: so ca hoti dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimako.
an6.57:13.4_0: So kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati.
an6.57:13.5_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe,
an6.57:13.5_2: satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṁ bhāvetvā akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:13.6_0: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:14.1_0: Kathañcānanda, sukkābhijātiyo samāno kaṇhaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati?
an6.57:14.2_1: ekacco ucce kule paccājāto hoti—khattiyamahāsālakule vā brāhmaṇamahāsālakule vā gahapatimahāsālakule vā,
an6.57:14.2_2: aḍḍhe mahaddhane mahābhoge pahūtajātarūparajate pahūtavittūpakaraṇe pahūtadhanadhaññe.
an6.57:14.3_0: So ca hoti abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato,
an6.57:14.3_1: lābhī annassa pānassa vatthassa yānassa mālāgandhavilepanassa seyyāvasathapadīpeyyassa.
an6.57:14.4_0: So kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
an6.57:14.5_2: manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an6.57:14.6_0: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, sukkābhijātiyo samāno kaṇhaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:15.1_0: Kathañcānanda, sukkābhijātiyo samāno sukkaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati?
an6.57:15.2_0: Idhānanda, ekacco ucce kule paccājāto hoti—khattiyamahāsālakule vā …pe…
an6.57:15.4_0: So kāyena sucaritaṁ carati, vācāya sucaritaṁ carati, manasā sucaritaṁ carati.
an6.57:15.5_2: manasā sucaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an6.57:15.6_0: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, sukkābhijātiyo samāno sukkaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:16.1_0: Kathañcānanda, sukkābhijātiyo samāno akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati?
an6.57:16.2_1: ekacco ucce kule paccājāto hoti—khattiyamahāsālakule vā brāhmaṇamahāsālakule vā gahapatimahāsālakule vā,
an6.57:16.2_2: aḍḍhe mahaddhane mahābhoge pahūtajātarūparajate pahūtavittūpakaraṇe pahūtadhanadhaññe.
an6.57:16.3_0: So ca hoti abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato,
an6.57:16.3_1: lābhī annassa pānassa vatthassa yānassa mālāgandhavilepanassa seyyāvasathapadīpeyyassa.
an6.57:16.4_0: So kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati.
an6.57:16.5_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe,
an6.57:16.5_2: satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṁ bhāvetvā akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.57:16.6_0: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, sukkābhijātiyo samāno akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati.
an6.58:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an6.58:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ye āsavā saṁvarā pahātabbā te saṁvarena pahīnā honti,
an6.58:2.3_0: ye āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā te paṭisevanāya pahīnā honti,
an6.58:2.4_0: ye āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā te adhivāsanāya pahīnā honti,
an6.58:2.5_0: ye āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā te parivajjanāya pahīnā honti,
an6.58:2.6_0: ye āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā te vinodanāya pahīnā honti,
an6.58:2.7_0: ye āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā te bhāvanāya pahīnā honti.
an6.58:3.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā saṁvarā pahātabbā ye saṁvarena pahīnā honti?
an6.58:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cakkhundriyasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati.
an6.58:3.3_2: cakkhundriyasaṁvaraṁ asaṁvutassa viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā,
an6.58:3.3_3: cakkhundriyasaṁvaraṁ saṁvutassa viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an6.58:3.9_2: manindriyasaṁvaraṁ asaṁvutassa viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā,
an6.58:3.9_3: manindriyasaṁvaraṁ saṁvutassa viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an6.58:3.10_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā saṁvarā pahātabbā ye saṁvarena pahīnā honti.
an6.58:4.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā ye paṭisevanāya pahīnā honti?
an6.58:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṁ paṭisevati:
an6.58:4.5_0: ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya,
an6.58:4.5_5: yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro ca’.
an6.58:4.10_3: paṭisevato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an6.58:4.11_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā ye paṭisevanāya pahīnā honti.
an6.58:5.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā ye adhivāsanāya pahīnā honti?
an6.58:5.2_2: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa,
an6.58:5.2_6: uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
an6.58:5.3_3: adhivāsato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an6.58:5.4_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā ye adhivāsanāya pahīnā honti.
an6.58:6.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā ye parivajjanāya pahīnā honti?
an6.58:6.2_2: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso caṇḍaṁ hatthiṁ parivajjeti,
an6.58:6.2_6: ahiṁ khāṇuṁ kaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṁ sobbhaṁ papātaṁ candanikaṁ oḷigallaṁ,
an6.58:6.2_9: yathārūpe pāpake mitte bhajantaṁ viññū sabrahmacārī pāpakesu ṭhānesu okappeyyuṁ,
an6.58:6.2_10: so tañca anāsanaṁ tañca agocaraṁ te ca pāpake mitte paṭisaṅkhā yoniso parivajjeti.
an6.58:6.3_3: parivajjayato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an6.58:6.4_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā ye parivajjanāya pahīnā honti.
an6.58:7.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā ye vinodanāya pahīnā honti?
an6.58:7.2_2: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso uppannaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti,
an6.58:7.5_0: uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
an6.58:7.6_3: vinodayato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an6.58:7.7_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā ye vinodanāya pahīnā honti.
an6.58:8.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā ye bhāvanāya pahīnā honti?
an6.58:8.2_2: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vosaggapariṇāmiṁ,
an6.58:8.8_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vosaggapariṇāmiṁ.
an6.58:8.9_3: bhāvayato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an6.58:8.10_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā ye bhāvanāya pahīnā honti.
an6.58:9.1_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an6.59:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
an6.59:1.3_0: Atha kho dārukammiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.59:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho dārukammikaṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an6.59:1.4_0: “api nu te, gahapati, kule dānaṁ dīyatī”ti?
an6.59:1.6_0: Tañca kho ye te bhikkhū āraññikā piṇḍapātikā paṁsukūlikā arahanto vā arahattamaggaṁ vā samāpannā,
an6.59:2.1_4: jātarūparajataṁ sādiyantena ime vā arahanto ime vā arahattamaggaṁ samāpannāti.
an6.59:3.1_1: bhikkhu hoti uddhato unnaḷo capalo mukharo vikiṇṇavāco muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
an6.59:3.3_1: bhikkhu hoti anuddhato anunnaḷo acapalo amukharo avikiṇṇavāco upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṁvutindriyo.
an6.59:4.1_0: Gāmantavihārī cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:4.3_0: Gāmantavihārī cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:5.1_0: Piṇḍapātiko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:5.3_0: Piṇḍapātiko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:6.1_0: Nemantaniko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:6.3_0: Nemantaniko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:7.1_0: Paṁsukūliko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato …pe…
an6.59:7.3_0: Paṁsukūliko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato …pe…
an6.59:8.1_1: bhikkhu hoti uddhato unnaḷo capalo mukharo vikiṇṇavāco muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
an6.59:8.3_1: bhikkhu hoti anuddhato anunnaḷo acapalo amukharo avikiṇṇavāco upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṁvutindriyo.
an6.59:9.1_0: Iṅgha tvaṁ, gahapati, saṅghe dānaṁ dehi.
an6.59:9.2_0: Saṅghe te dānaṁ dadato cittaṁ pasīdissati.
an6.59:9.3_0: So tvaṁ pasannacitto kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjissasī”ti.
an6.60:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
an6.60:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā therā bhikkhū pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā maṇḍalamāḷe sannisinnā sannipatitā abhidhammakathaṁ kathenti.
an6.60:1.4_0: Tatra sudaṁ āyasmā citto hatthisāriputto therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhidhammakathaṁ kathentānaṁ antarantarā kathaṁ opāteti.
an6.60:1.5_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ cittaṁ hatthisāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an6.60:1.6_0: “māyasmā citto hatthisāriputto therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhidhammakathaṁ kathentānaṁ antarantarā kathaṁ opātesi,
an6.60:1.7_1: āyasmato cittassa hatthisāriputtassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavocuṁ:
an6.60:1.9_0: Pahoti cāyasmā citto hatthisāriputto therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhidhammakathaṁ kathetun”ti.
an6.60:2.1_0: “Dujjānaṁ kho etaṁ, āvuso, parassa cetopariyāyaṁ ajānantehi.
an6.60:2.2_4: yāva satthāraṁ upanissāya viharati aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ.
an6.60:2.3_0: Yato ca kho so vapakassateva satthārā,
an6.60:2.3_2: so saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi raññā rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi.
an6.60:2.4_0: Tassa saṁsaṭṭhassa vissatthassa pākatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
an6.60:2.5_0: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an6.60:3.1_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, goṇo kiṭṭhādo dāmena vā baddho vaje vā oruddho.
an6.60:3.2_2: ‘na dānāyaṁ goṇo kiṭṭhādo punadeva kiṭṭhaṁ otarissatī’ti,
an6.60:3.4_1: yaṁ so goṇo kiṭṭhādo dāmaṁ vā chetvā vajaṁ vā bhinditvā,
an6.60:3.5_3: upasantupasanto hoti yāva satthāraṁ upanissāya viharati aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ.
an6.60:3.6_0: Yato ca kho so vapakassateva satthārā,
an6.60:3.6_2: so saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi raññā rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi.
an6.60:3.7_0: Tassa saṁsaṭṭhassa vissatthassa pākatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
an6.60:3.8_0: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an6.60:4.1_0: Idha panāvuso, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:4.2_0: So ‘lābhimhi paṭhamassa jhānassā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi …pe…
an6.60:4.4_1: cātumahāpathe thullaphusitako devo vassanto rajaṁ antaradhāpeyya,
an6.60:4.5_2: ‘na dāni amusmiṁ cātumahāpathe punadeva rajo pātubhavissatī’ti,
an6.60:4.7_1: yaṁ amusmiṁ cātumahāpathe manussā vā atikkameyyuṁ,
an6.60:4.8_0: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, idhekacco puggalo vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:4.9_0: So ‘lābhimhi paṭhamassa jhānassā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi …pe…
an6.60:5.1_0: Idha panāvuso, ekacco puggalo vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:5.2_0: So ‘lābhimhi dutiyassa jhānassā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi …pe…
an6.60:5.4_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahantaṁ taḷākaṁ.
an6.60:5.5_0: Tattha thullaphusitako devo vuṭṭho sippisambukampi sakkharakaṭhalampi antaradhāpeyya.
an6.60:5.6_2: ‘na dāni amusmiṁ taḷāke punadeva sippisambukā vā sakkharakaṭhalā vā pātubhavissantī’ti,
an6.60:5.8_1: yaṁ amusmiṁ taḷāke manussā vā piveyyuṁ,
an6.60:5.10_0: So ‘lābhimhi dutiyassa jhānassā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi …pe…
an6.60:6.1_0: Idha panāvuso, ekacco puggalo pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:6.2_0: So ‘lābhimhi tatiyassa jhānassā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi …pe…
an6.60:6.4_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, purisaṁ paṇītabhojanaṁ bhuttāviṁ ābhidosikaṁ bhojanaṁ nacchādeyya.
an6.60:6.5_2: ‘na dāni amuṁ purisaṁ punadeva bhojanaṁ chādessatī’ti,
an6.60:6.7_1: amuṁ purisaṁ paṇītabhojanaṁ bhuttāviṁ yāvassa sā ojā kāye ṭhassati tāva na aññaṁ bhojanaṁ chādessati.
an6.60:6.8_0: Yato ca khvassa sā ojā antaradhāyissati, atha punadeva taṁ bhojanaṁ chādeyyāti.
an6.60:6.9_0: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, idhekacco puggalo pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:6.10_0: So ‘lābhimhi tatiyassa jhānassā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi …pe…
an6.60:7.1_1: ekacco puggalo sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā …pe…
an6.60:7.2_0: So ‘lābhimhi catutthassa jhānassā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi …pe…
an6.60:7.4_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, pabbatasaṅkhepe udakarahado nivāto vigataūmiko.
an6.60:7.5_2: ‘na dāni amusmiṁ udakarahade punadeva ūmi pātubhavissatī’ti,
an6.60:7.7_1: yā puratthimāya disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi.
an6.60:7.7_5: yā dakkhiṇāya disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi.
an6.60:7.8_1: idhekacco puggalo sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā …pe…
an6.60:7.9_0: So ‘lābhimhi catutthassa jhānassā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi …pe…
an6.60:8.1_1: ekacco puggalo sabbanimittānaṁ amanasikārā animittaṁ cetosamādhiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:8.2_0: So ‘lābhimhi animittassa cetosamādhissā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi
an6.60:8.3_0: Tassa saṁsaṭṭhassa vissatthassa pākatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
an6.60:8.4_0: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an6.60:8.5_1: rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā caturaṅginiyā senāya addhānamaggappaṭipanno aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe ekarattiṁ vāsaṁ upagaccheyya.
an6.60:8.6_0: Tatra hatthisaddena assasaddena rathasaddena pattisaddena bheripaṇavasaṅkhatiṇavaninnādasaddena cīrikasaddo antaradhāyeyya.
an6.60:8.7_2: ‘na dāni amusmiṁ vanasaṇḍe punadeva cīrikasaddo pātubhavissatī’ti,
an6.60:8.9_1: yaṁ so rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā tamhā vanasaṇḍā pakkameyya,
an6.60:8.10_1: idhekacco puggalo sabbanimittānaṁ amanasikārā animittaṁ cetosamādhiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:8.11_0: So ‘lābhimhi animittassa cetosamādhissā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi
an6.60:8.12_0: Tassa saṁsaṭṭhassa vissatthassa pākatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
an6.60:8.13_0: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattatī”ti.
an6.60:9.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā citto hatthisāriputto aparena samayena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an6.60:9.2_0: Atha kho cittassa hatthisāriputtassa sahāyakā bhikkhū yenāyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an6.60:9.3_0: “kiṁ nu kho āyasmatā mahākoṭṭhikena citto hatthisāriputto cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
an6.60:9.4_1: atha ca pana sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissatī’ti;
an6.60:9.6_2: atha ca pana sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissatī’”ti?
an6.60:9.8_1: atha ca pana sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissatī’ti.
an6.60:9.10_2: atha ca pana sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissatī’”ti.
an6.60:10.1_0: Atha kho cittassa hatthisāriputtassa sahāyakā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an6.60:10.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
an6.60:10.2_2: atha ca pana sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattatī”ti.
an6.60:11.1_0: Atha kho citto hatthisāriputto nacirasseva kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbaji.
an6.60:11.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā citto hatthisāriputto eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
an6.60:11.2_2: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an6.60:11.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
an6.60:11.4_0: Aññataro ca panāyasmā citto hatthisāriputto arahataṁ ahosīti.
an6.61:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
an6.61:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulānaṁ therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṁ maṇḍalamāḷe
an6.61:3.1_0: “Katamo nu kho, āvuso, eko anto, katamo dutiyo anto, kiṁ majjhe, kā sibbinī”ti?
an6.61:3.2_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:3.3_0: “phasso kho, āvuso, eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, phassanirodho majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:3.4_0: taṇhā hi naṁ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:3.5_3: abhiññeyyaṁ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṁ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti.
an6.61:4.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:4.2_0: “atītaṁ kho, āvuso, eko anto, anāgataṁ dutiyo anto, paccuppannaṁ majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:4.3_0: taṇhā hi naṁ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:4.4_4: pariññeyyaṁ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti.
an6.61:5.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:5.3_0: taṇhā hi naṁ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:5.4_4: pariññeyyaṁ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti.
an6.61:6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:6.2_0: “nāmaṁ kho, āvuso, eko anto, rūpaṁ dutiyo anto, viññāṇaṁ majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:6.3_0: taṇhā hi naṁ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:6.4_3: abhiññeyyaṁ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṁ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti.
an6.61:7.1_0: Evaṁ vutte aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:7.3_0: taṇhā hi naṁ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:7.4_3: abhiññeyyaṁ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṁ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti.
an6.61:8.1_0: Evaṁ vutte aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:8.2_0: “sakkāyo kho, āvuso, eko anto, sakkāyasamudayo dutiyo anto, sakkāyanirodho majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:8.3_0: taṇhā hi naṁ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:8.4_3: abhiññeyyaṁ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṁ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti.
an6.61:9.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.61:9.2_0: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
an6.61:9.3_0: Āyāmāvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamissāma; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocessāma.
an6.61:9.4_0: Yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṁ dhāressāmā”ti.
an6.61:10.1_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho therā bhikkhū tassa bhikkhuno paccassosuṁ.
an6.61:10.2_0: Atha kho therā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an6.61:10.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho therā bhikkhū yāvatako ahosi sabbeheva saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo,
an6.61:10.5_3: api ca yaṁ mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṁ pārāyane metteyyapañhe:
an6.61:12.1_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an6.61:12.2_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho therā bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an6.61:12.4_0: “phasso kho, bhikkhave, eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, phassanirodho majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī;
an6.61:12.5_0: taṇhā hi naṁ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
an6.61:12.6_4: abhiññeyyaṁ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṁ parijānanto diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotī”ti.
an6.62:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena daṇḍakappakaṁ nāma kosalānaṁ nigamo tadavasari.
an6.62:1.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle paññatte āsane nisīdi.
an6.62:1.4_0: Te ca bhikkhū daṇḍakappakaṁ pavisiṁsu āvasathaṁ pariyesituṁ.
an6.62:2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ yena aciravatī nadī tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṁ.
an6.62:2.2_0: Aciravatiyā nadiyā gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
an6.62:2.3_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an6.62:2.4_0: “kiṁ nu kho, āvuso ānanda, sabbaṁ cetaso samannāharitvā nu kho devadatto bhagavatā byākato:
an6.62:2.5_0: ‘āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho’ti, udāhu kenacideva pariyāyenāti?
an6.62:2.6_0: Evaṁ kho panetaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā byākatan”ti.
an6.62:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.62:3.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.62:3.2_1: sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ yena aciravatī nadī tenupasaṅkamiṁ gattāni parisiñcituṁ.
an6.62:3.3_0: Aciravatiyā nadiyā gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsiṁ gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
an6.62:3.4_0: Atha kho, bhante, aññataro bhikkhu yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ etadavoca:
an6.62:3.5_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho, āvuso ānanda, sabbaṁ cetaso samannāharitvā nu kho devadatto bhagavatā byākato—
an6.62:3.6_0: āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekicchoti, udāhu kenacideva pariyāyenā’ti?
an6.62:3.7_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocaṁ:
an6.62:4.1_0: “So vā kho, ānanda, bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero vā pana bālo abyatto.
an6.62:4.2_0: Kathañhi nāma yaṁ mayā ekaṁsena byākataṁ tattha dvejjhaṁ āpajjissati.
an6.62:4.3_2: yo evaṁ mayā sabbaṁ cetaso samannāharitvā byākato,
an6.62:4.4_0: Yāvakīvañcāhaṁ, ānanda, devadattassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi sukkadhammaṁ addasaṁ;
an6.62:4.7_0: Yato ca kho ahaṁ, ānanda, devadattassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi sukkadhammaṁ na addasaṁ;
an6.62:5.1_0: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, gūthakūpo sādhikaporiso pūro gūthassa samatittiko.
an6.62:5.3_0: Tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya atthakāmo hitakāmo yogakkhemakāmo tamhā gūthakūpā uddharitukāmo.
an6.62:5.4_0: So taṁ gūthakūpaṁ samantānuparigacchanto neva passeyya tassa purisassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi gūthena amakkhitaṁ,
an6.62:5.5_0: Evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, ānanda, yato devadattassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi sukkadhammaṁ na addasaṁ;
an6.62:5.8_0: Sace tumhe, ānanda, suṇeyyātha tathāgatassa purisindriyañāṇāni vibhajissāmī”ti?
an6.62:6.2_0: yaṁ bhagavā purisindriyañāṇāni vibhajeyya. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
an6.62:6.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.62:7.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, ānanda, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:7.2_0: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā’ti.
an6.62:7.3_0: Tamenaṁ aparena samayena evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:7.4_0: ‘imassa kho puggalassa kusalā dhammā antarahitā, akusalā dhammā sammukhībhūtā.
an6.62:7.5_0: Atthi ca khvassa kusalamūlaṁ asamucchinnaṁ, tamhā tassa kusalā kusalaṁ pātubhavissati.
an6.62:7.7_1: bījāni akhaṇḍāni apūtīni avātātapahatāni sāradāni sukhasayitāni sukhette suparikammakatāya bhūmiyā nikkhittāni.
an6.62:7.8_0: Jāneyyāsi tvaṁ, ānanda, imāni bījāni vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissantī”ti?
an6.62:7.10_0: “Evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, ānanda, idhekaccaṁ puggalaṁ evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:7.11_0: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā’ti.
an6.62:7.12_0: Tamenaṁ aparena samayena evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:7.13_0: ‘imassa kho puggalassa kusalā dhammā antarahitā, akusalā dhammā sammukhībhūtā.
an6.62:7.14_0: Atthi ca khvassa kusalamūlaṁ asamucchinnaṁ, tamhā tassa kusalā kusalaṁ pātubhavissati.
an6.62:7.16_0: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa purisapuggalo cetasā ceto paricca vidito hoti.

an6.62:7.18_0: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa āyatiṁ dhammasamuppādo cetasā ceto paricca vidito hoti.

an6.62:11.15_0: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā’ti.
an6.62:11.16_0: Tamenaṁ aparena samayena evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:11.17_0: ‘imassa kho puggalassa akusalā dhammā antarahitā, kusalā dhammā sammukhībhūtā.
an6.62:11.18_0: Atthi ca khvassa akusalamūlaṁ asamucchinnaṁ, tampi sabbena sabbaṁ samugghātaṁ gacchati.
an6.62:11.20_0: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa purisapuggalo cetasā ceto paricca vidito hoti.
an6.62:11.21_0: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa purisindriyañāṇaṁ cetasā ceto paricca viditaṁ hoti.
an6.62:11.22_0: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa āyatiṁ dhammasamuppādo cetasā ceto paricca vidito hoti.
an6.62:12.1_0: Idha panāhaṁ, ānanda, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:12.2_0: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā’ti.
an6.62:12.3_0: Tamenaṁ aparena samayena evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:12.5_0: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, aṅgārāni sītāni nibbutāni sukkhe tiṇapuñje vā kaṭṭhapuñje vā nikkhittāni.
an6.62:12.6_0: Jāneyyāsi tvaṁ, ānanda, nayimāni aṅgārāni vuḍḍhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissantī”ti?
an6.62:12.8_0: “Evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, ānanda, idhekaccaṁ puggalaṁ evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:12.9_0: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā’ti.
an6.62:12.10_0: Tamenaṁ aparena samayena evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:12.12_0: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa purisapuggalo cetasā ceto paricca vidito hoti.
an6.62:12.13_0: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa purisindriyañāṇaṁ cetasā ceto paricca viditaṁ hoti.
an6.62:12.14_0: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa āyatiṁ dhammasamuppādo cetasā ceto paricca vidito hoti.
an6.62:13.1_1: ye te purimā tayo puggalā tesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ eko aparihānadhammo,
an6.62:13.2_1: yeme pacchimā tayo puggalā imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ eko parihānadhammo,
an6.63:1.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an6.63:1.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an6.63:8.4_0: cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
an6.63:8.8_0: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā.
an6.63:8.9_0: Api ca kho, bhikkhave, nete kāmā kāmaguṇā nāmete ariyassa vinaye vuccanti—
an6.63:12.2_2: kāmayamāno tajjaṁ tajjaṁ attabhāvaṁ abhinibbatteti puññabhāgiyaṁ vā apuññabhāgiyaṁ vā,
an6.63:13.3_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo kāmanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
an6.63:14.1_8: so imaṁ nibbedhikaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pajānāti kāmanirodhaṁ.
an6.63:14.2_0: Kāmā, bhikkhave, veditabbā …pe… kāmanirodhagāminī paṭipadā veditabbāti,
an6.63:14.3_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an6.63:15.1_0: Vedanā, bhikkhave, veditabbā …pe… vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā veditabbāti,
an6.63:15.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
an6.63:15.4_0: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
an6.63:18.2_2: vediyamāno tajjaṁ tajjaṁ attabhāvaṁ abhinibbatteti puññabhāgiyaṁ vā apuññabhāgiyaṁ vā,
an6.63:19.3_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
an6.63:20.1_8: So imaṁ nibbedhikaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pajānāti vedanānirodhaṁ.
an6.63:20.2_0: Vedanā, bhikkhave, veditabbā …pe… vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā veditabbāti,
an6.63:20.3_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an6.63:21.1_0: Saññā, bhikkhave, veditabbā …pe… saññānirodhagāminī paṭipadā veditabbāti,
an6.63:21.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
an6.63:21.4_0: rūpasaññā, saddasaññā, gandhasaññā, rasasaññā, phoṭṭhabbasaññā, dhammasaññā.
an6.63:24.3_0: Yathā yathā naṁ sañjānāti tathā tathā voharati, evaṁ saññī ahosinti.
an6.63:25.3_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saññānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
an6.63:26.1_8: so imaṁ nibbedhikaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pajānāti saññānirodhaṁ.
an6.63:26.2_0: Saññā, bhikkhave, veditabbā …pe… saññānirodhagāminī paṭipadā veditabbāti.
an6.63:26.3_0: Iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an6.63:27.1_0: Āsavā, bhikkhave, veditabbā …pe… āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā veditabbāti,
an6.63:27.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
an6.63:30.2_2: avijjāgato tajjaṁ tajjaṁ attabhāvaṁ abhinibbatteti puññabhāgiyaṁ vā apuññabhāgiyaṁ vā,
an6.63:31.3_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
an6.63:32.1_8: so imaṁ nibbedhikaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pajānāti āsavanirodhaṁ.
an6.63:32.2_0: Āsavā, bhikkhave, veditabbā …pe… āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā veditabbāti.
an6.63:32.3_0: Iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an6.63:33.1_0: Kammaṁ, bhikkhave, veditabbaṁ …pe… kammanirodhagāminī paṭipadā veditabbāti, iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
an6.63:36.3_0: diṭṭheva dhamme, upapajje vā, apare vā pariyāye.
an6.63:37.3_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo kammanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
an6.63:38.1_8: so imaṁ nibbedhikaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pajānāti kammanirodhaṁ.
an6.63:38.2_0: Kammaṁ, bhikkhave, veditabbaṁ …pe… kammanirodhagāminī paṭipadā veditabbāti,
an6.63:38.3_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an6.63:39.2_0: Iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ, kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
an6.63:41.2_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ adhimattaṁ, atthi parittaṁ, atthi dandhavirāgi, atthi khippavirāgi.
an6.63:42.2_2: ekacco yena dukkhena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto socati kilamati paridevati,
an6.63:42.2_5: yena vā pana dukkhena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto bahiddhā pariyeṭṭhiṁ āpajjati:
an6.63:42.3_0: ‘ko ekapadaṁ dvipadaṁ jānāti imassa dukkhassa nirodhāyā’ti?
an6.63:42.4_0: Sammohavepakkaṁ vāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ vadāmi pariyeṭṭhivepakkaṁ vā.
an6.63:43.3_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo dukkhassa nirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
an6.63:44.1_8: so imaṁ nibbedhikaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pajānāti dukkhanirodhaṁ.
an6.63:44.3_0: Iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an6.63:45.1_0: Ayaṁ kho so, bhikkhave, nibbedhikapariyāyo dhammapariyāyo”ti.
an6.64:1.1_3: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,
an6.64:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an6.64:1.4_2: tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi,
an6.64:1.4_5: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,
an6.64:2.1_2: tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an6.64:2.2_2: tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, idampi,
an6.64:2.2_5: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,
an6.64:3.1_2: tathāgato jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an6.64:3.2_5: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,
an6.64:4.1_5: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
an6.64:4.2_5: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati, idampi,
an6.64:4.2_8: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,
an6.64:5.2_6: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,
an6.64:6.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgato āsavānaṁ khayā …pe… sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an6.64:6.2_6: yaṁ balaṁ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,
an6.64:6.3_3: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,
an6.64:7.1_2: pare tathāgataṁ ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇena upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchanti.
an6.64:7.2_2: tathāgatassa ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ viditaṁ tathā tathā tesaṁ tathāgato
an6.64:7.2_3: ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇena pañhaṁ puṭṭho byākaroti.
an6.64:8.1_2: pare tathāgataṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇena upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchanti.
an6.64:8.2_2: tathāgatassa atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ viditaṁ
an6.64:8.2_3: tathā tathā tesaṁ tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ
an6.64:9.1_2: pare tathāgataṁ jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇena upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchanti.
an6.64:9.2_2: tathāgatassa jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ viditaṁ
an6.64:9.2_3: tathā tathā tesaṁ tathāgato jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ
an6.64:10.1_2: pare tathāgataṁ pubbenivāsānussatiṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇena upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchanti.
an6.64:10.2_2: tathāgatassa pubbenivāsānussatiṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ viditaṁ tathā tathā tesaṁ tathāgato pubbenivāsānussatiṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇena pañhaṁ puṭṭho byākaroti.
an6.64:11.1_2: pare tathāgataṁ sattānaṁ cutūpapātaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇena upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchanti.
an6.64:11.2_2: tathāgatassa sattānaṁ cutūpapātaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ viditaṁ tathā tathā tesaṁ tathāgato sattānaṁ cutūpapātaṁ
an6.64:12.2_3: yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ viditaṁ tathā tathā tesaṁ tathāgato āsavānaṁ khayā …pe…
an6.64:13.1_2: yampidaṁ ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tampi samāhitassa vadāmi no asamāhitassa.
an6.64:13.2_0: Yampidaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tampi samāhitassa vadāmi no asamāhitassa.
an6.64:13.3_0: Yampidaṁ jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tampi samāhitassa vadāmi no asamāhitassa.
an6.64:13.4_0: Yampidaṁ pubbenivāsānussatiṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tampi samāhitassa vadāmi no asamāhitassa.
an6.64:13.5_0: Yampidaṁ sattānaṁ cutūpapātaṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tampi samāhitassa vadāmi no asamāhitassa.
an6.64:13.6_0: Yampidaṁ āsavānaṁ khayā …pe… yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ tampi samāhitassa vadāmi no asamāhitassa.
an6.64:13.7_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, samādhi maggo, asamādhi kummaggo”ti.
an6.65:1.1_0: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo anāgāmiphalaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.65:1.3_0: Assaddhiyaṁ, ahirikaṁ, anottappaṁ, kosajjaṁ, muṭṭhassaccaṁ, duppaññataṁ—
an6.65:1.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo anāgāmiphalaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.65:2.1_0: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo anāgāmiphalaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.65:2.3_0: Assaddhiyaṁ, ahirikaṁ, anottappaṁ, kosajjaṁ, muṭṭhassaccaṁ, duppaññataṁ—
an6.65:2.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo anāgāmiphalaṁ sacchikātun”ti.
an6.66:1.1_0: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.66:1.3_0: Thinaṁ, middhaṁ, uddhaccaṁ, kukkuccaṁ, assaddhiyaṁ, pamādaṁ—
an6.66:1.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.66:2.1_0: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.66:2.3_0: Thinaṁ, middhaṁ, uddhaccaṁ, kukkuccaṁ, assaddhiyaṁ, pamādaṁ—
an6.66:2.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātun”ti.
an6.67:1.1_4: tesañca diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjamāno ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.67:1.2_0: ‘Ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ aparipūretvā sekhaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.67:1.3_0: ‘Sekhaṁ dhammaṁ aparipūretvā sīlāni paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.67:1.4_0: ‘Sīlāni aparipūretvā kāmarāgaṁ vā rūparāgaṁ vā arūparāgaṁ vā pajahissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.67:2.1_4: tesañca diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjamāno ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.67:2.2_0: ‘Ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ paripūretvā sekhaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.67:2.3_0: ‘Sekhaṁ dhammaṁ paripūretvā sīlāni paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.67:2.4_0: ‘Sīlāni paripūretvā kāmarāgaṁ vā rūparāgaṁ vā arūparāgaṁ vā pajahissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjatī”ti.
an6.68:1.1_4: eko paviveke abhiramissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.68:1.2_0: ‘Eko paviveke anabhiramanto cittassa nimittaṁ gahessatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.68:1.3_0: ‘Cittassa nimittaṁ agaṇhanto sammādiṭṭhiṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.68:1.4_0: ‘Sammādiṭṭhiṁ aparipūretvā sammāsamādhiṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.68:1.5_0: ‘Sammāsamādhiṁ aparipūretvā saṁyojanāni pajahissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.68:1.6_0: ‘Saṁyojanāni appahāya nibbānaṁ sacchikarissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.68:2.1_2: bhikkhu na saṅgaṇikārāmo na saṅgaṇikarato na saṅgaṇikārāmataṁ anuyutto,
an6.68:2.1_3: na gaṇārāmo na gaṇarato na gaṇārāmataṁ anuyutto,
an6.68:2.2_0: ‘Eko paviveke abhiramanto cittassa nimittaṁ gahessatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.68:2.3_0: ‘Cittassa nimittaṁ gaṇhanto sammādiṭṭhiṁ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.69:1.1_0: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.69:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.69:1.4_0: Satthugāravatā, dhammagāravatā, saṅghagāravatā, sikkhāgāravatā, sovacassatā, kalyāṇamittatā—
an6.69:1.5_0: ime kho, bhante, cha dhammā bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an6.69:1.8_0: Atha kho sā devatā “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an6.69:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.69:2.2_2: rattiṁ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an6.69:2.5_0: Satthugāravatā, dhammagāravatā, saṅghagāravatā, sikkhāgāravatā, sovacassatā, kalyāṇamittatā—
an6.69:2.6_0: ime kho, bhante, cha dhammā bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī’ti.
an6.69:2.8_0: Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
an6.69:3.1_0: Evaṁ vutte āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā etadavoca:
an6.69:3.2_0: “imassa kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi.
an6.69:3.3_0: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu attanā ca satthugāravo hoti satthugāravatāya ca vaṇṇavādī.
an6.69:3.4_0: Ye caññe bhikkhū na satthugāravā te ca satthugāravatāya samādapeti.
an6.69:3.5_0: Ye caññe bhikkhū satthugāravā tesañca vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇati bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an6.69:3.11_0: Ye caññe bhikkhū na kalyāṇamittā te ca kalyāṇamittatāya samādapeti.
an6.69:3.12_0: Ye caññe bhikkhū kalyāṇamittā tesañca vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇati bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an6.69:3.13_0: Imassa kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
an6.69:4.2_0: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, sāriputta, imassa mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
an6.69:4.3_0: Idha, sāriputta, bhikkhu attanā ca satthugāravo hoti satthugāravatāya ca vaṇṇavādī.
an6.69:4.4_0: Ye caññe bhikkhū na satthugāravā te ca satthugāravatāya samādapeti.
an6.69:4.5_0: Ye caññe bhikkhū satthugāravā tesañca vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇati bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an6.69:4.11_0: Ye caññe bhikkhū na kalyāṇamittā te ca kalyāṇamittatāya samādapeti.
an6.69:4.12_0: Ye caññe bhikkhū kalyāṇamittā tesañca vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇati bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
an6.69:4.13_0: Imassa kho, sāriputta, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
an6.70:1.1_2: bhikkhu na santena samādhinā na paṇītena na paṭippassaddhiladdhena na ekodibhāvādhigatena anekavihitaṁ
an6.70:1.1_5: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattessatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.70:1.2_0: ‘Dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇissati—dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike cā’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.70:1.4_0: sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ sarāgaṁ cittanti pajānissati …pe…
an6.70:1.5_0: vimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuttaṁ cittanti pajānissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.70:1.6_3: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.70:1.7_1: yathākammūpage satte pajānissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.70:1.8_0: ‘Āsavānaṁ khayā …pe… sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.70:2.1_2: bhikkhu santena samādhinā paṇītena paṭippassaddhiladdhena ekodibhāvādhigatena anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhavissati …pe…
an6.70:2.1_3: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattessatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.70:2.2_0: ‘Dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇissati—dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike cā’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.70:2.4_0: sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ sarāgaṁ cittanti pajānissati …pe…
an6.70:2.5_0: vimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuttaṁ cittanti pajānissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.70:2.6_3: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.70:2.7_0: ‘Dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passissati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an6.70:2.7_1: sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.71:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇituṁ sati sati āyatane.
an6.71:1.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇituṁ sati sati āyatane.
an6.71:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇituṁ sati sati āyatane.
an6.71:2.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇituṁ sati sati āyatane”ti.
an6.72:1.1_0: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo samādhismiṁ balataṁ pāpuṇituṁ.
an6.72:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo samādhismiṁ balataṁ pāpuṇituṁ.
an6.72:2.1_0: Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo samādhismiṁ balataṁ pāpuṇituṁ.

an6.73:1.1_0: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an6.73:1.4_0: Kāmesu kho panassa ādīnavo na yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭho hoti.
an6.73:1.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an6.73:2.1_0: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an6.73:2.4_0: kāmesu kho panassa ādīnavo na yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭho hoti.
an6.73:2.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharitun”ti.
an6.74:1.1_0: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an6.74:1.3_0: Kāmavitakkaṁ, byāpādavitakkaṁ, vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ, kāmasaññaṁ, byāpādasaññaṁ, vihiṁsāsaññaṁ—
an6.74:1.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an6.74:2.1_0: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an6.74:2.3_0: Kāmavitakkaṁ, byāpādavitakkaṁ, vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ, kāmasaññaṁ, byāpādasaññaṁ, vihiṁsāsaññaṁ—
an6.74:2.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharitun”ti.
an6.75:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ,
an6.75:1.1_3: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
an6.75:1.3_0: Kāmavitakkena, byāpādavitakkena, vihiṁsāvitakkena, kāmasaññāya, byāpādasaññāya, vihiṁsāsaññāya—
an6.75:1.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ,
an6.75:1.4_3: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
an6.75:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ,
an6.75:2.1_3: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā.
an6.75:2.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ,
an6.75:2.4_3: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
an6.76:1.1_0: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.76:1.3_0: Mānaṁ, omānaṁ, atimānaṁ, adhimānaṁ, thambhaṁ, atinipātaṁ.
an6.76:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.76:2.1_0: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.76:2.3_0: Mānaṁ, omānaṁ, atimānaṁ, adhimānaṁ, thambhaṁ, atinipātaṁ.
an6.76:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātun”ti.
an6.77:1.1_2: dhamme appahāya abhabbo uttari manussadhammaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.77:1.3_0: Muṭṭhassaccaṁ, asampajaññaṁ, indriyesu aguttadvārataṁ, bhojane amattaññutaṁ, kuhanaṁ, lapanaṁ.
an6.77:1.4_2: cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo uttari manussadhammaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.77:2.1_0: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo uttari manussadhammaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.77:2.3_0: Muṭṭhassaccaṁ, asampajaññaṁ, indriyesu aguttadvārataṁ, bhojane amattaññutaṁ, kuhanaṁ, lapanaṁ.
an6.77:2.4_2: cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo uttari manussadhammaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ sacchikātun”ti.
an6.78:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati,
an6.78:1.1_3: yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an6.78:1.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati,
an6.78:1.4_3: yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṁ khayāyā”ti.
an6.79:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo anadhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ adhigantuṁ,
an6.79:1.1_3: adhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
an6.79:1.3_5: anadhigatānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ adhigamāya na chandaṁ janeti,
an6.79:1.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo anadhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ adhigantuṁ,
an6.79:1.4_3: adhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.

an6.80:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahantattaṁ vepullattaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesu.
an6.80:1.3_2: bhikkhu ālokabahulo ca hoti yogabahulo ca vedabahulo ca asantuṭṭhibahulo ca anikkhittadhuro ca kusalesu dhammesu uttari ca patāreti.
an6.80:1.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahantattaṁ vepullattaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesū”ti.

an6.82:1.3_0: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, kāmesumicchācārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, luddho ca, pagabbho ca.

an6.84:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu,
an6.84:1.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu,

an6.85:1.3_5: yasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ ajjhupekkhitabbaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ na ajjhupekkhati,
an6.85:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo anuttaraṁ sītibhāvaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an6.85:2.1_0: Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anuttaraṁ sītibhāvaṁ sacchikātuṁ.

an6.85:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anuttaraṁ sītibhāvaṁ sacchikātun”ti.
an6.86:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an6.86:1.4_2: chahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.

an6.90:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammā diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā”ti.
an6.91:1.1_0: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo uppādetuṁ.
an6.91:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo uppādetun”ti.
an6.92:1.3_0: Abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo satthari agāravo viharituṁ appatisso,
an6.92:1.3_1: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo dhamme agāravo viharituṁ appatisso,
an6.92:1.3_2: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghe agāravo viharituṁ appatisso,
an6.92:1.3_3: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sikkhāya agāravo viharituṁ appatisso,
an6.92:1.3_4: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo anāgamanīyaṁ vatthuṁ paccāgantuṁ,
an6.92:1.3_5: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aṭṭhamaṁ bhavaṁ nibbattetuṁ.
an6.93:1.3_0: Abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṁ niccato upagantuṁ,
an6.93:1.3_1: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṁ sukhato upagantuṁ,
an6.93:1.3_2: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci dhammaṁ attato upagantuṁ,
an6.93:1.3_3: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo ānantariyaṁ kammaṁ kātuṁ,
an6.93:1.3_4: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kotūhalamaṅgalena suddhiṁ paccāgantuṁ,
an6.93:1.3_5: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo ito bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṁ gavesituṁ.
an6.94:1.3_0: Abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo mātaraṁ jīvitā voropetuṁ,
an6.94:1.3_1: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo pitaraṁ jīvitā voropetuṁ,
an6.94:1.3_2: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo arahantaṁ jīvitā voropetuṁ,
an6.94:1.3_3: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tathāgatassa duṭṭhena cittena lohitaṁ uppādetuṁ,
an6.94:1.3_5: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddisituṁ.
an6.95:1.3_0: Abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sayaṅkataṁ sukhadukkhaṁ paccāgantuṁ,
an6.95:1.3_1: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo paraṅkataṁ sukhadukkhaṁ paccāgantuṁ,
an6.95:1.3_2: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca sukhadukkhaṁ paccāgantuṁ,
an6.95:1.3_3: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo asayaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ paccāgantuṁ,
an6.95:1.3_4: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aparaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ paccāgantuṁ,
an6.95:1.3_5: abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo asayaṅkārañca aparaṅkārañca adhiccasamuppannaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ paccāgantuṁ.
an6.95:1.5_0: Tathā hissa, bhikkhave, diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa hetu ca sudiṭṭho hetusamuppannā ca dhammā.
an6.96:1.3_0: Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṁ,
an6.96:1.3_1: tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desetā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ,
an6.96:1.4_0: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, channaṁ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
an6.97:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha ānisaṁsā sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyā”ti.
an6.98:1.1_2: bhikkhu kañci saṅkhāraṁ niccato samanupassanto anulomikāya khantiyā samannāgato bhavissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.98:1.2_0: ‘Anulomikāya khantiyā asamannāgato sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.98:1.3_0: ‘Sammattaniyāmaṁ anokkamamāno sotāpattiphalaṁ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vā anāgāmiphalaṁ vā arahattaṁ vā sacchikarissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.98:2.1_2: bhikkhu sabbasaṅkhāre aniccato samanupassanto anulomikāya khantiyā samannāgato bhavissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.98:2.2_0: ‘Anulomikāya khantiyā samannāgato sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.98:2.3_0: ‘Sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamamāno sotāpattiphalaṁ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vā anāgāmiphalaṁ vā arahattaṁ vā sacchikarissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjatī”ti.
an6.99:1.1_0: “So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kañci saṅkhāraṁ sukhato samanupassanto …pe…
an6.100:1.1_0: “So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kañci dhammaṁ attato samanupassanto …pe…
an6.101:1.1_2: bhikkhu nibbānaṁ dukkhato samanupassanto anulomikāya khantiyā samannāgato bhavissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.101:1.2_0: ‘Anulomikāya khantiyā asamannāgato sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.101:1.3_0: ‘Sammattaniyāmaṁ anokkamamāno sotāpattiphalaṁ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vā anāgāmiphalaṁ vā arahattaṁ vā sacchikarissatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an6.101:2.1_2: bhikkhu nibbānaṁ sukhato samanupassanto anulomikāya khantiyā samannāgato bhavissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.101:2.2_0: ‘Anulomikāya khantiyā samannāgato sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an6.101:2.3_0: ‘Sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamamāno sotāpattiphalaṁ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vā anāgāmiphalaṁ vā arahattaṁ vā sacchikarissatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjatī”ti.
an6.102:1.1_2: ānisaṁse sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā sabbasaṅkhāresu anodhiṁ karitvā aniccasaññaṁ upaṭṭhāpetuṁ.
an6.102:1.4_2: cha ānisaṁse sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā sabbasaṅkhāresu anodhiṁ karitvā aniccasaññaṁ upaṭṭhāpetun”ti.
an6.103:1.1_2: ānisaṁse sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā sabbasaṅkhāresu anodhiṁ karitvā dukkhasaññaṁ upaṭṭhāpetuṁ.
an6.103:1.3_0: ‘Sabbasaṅkhāresu ca me nibbidasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā bhavissati, seyyathāpi ukkhittāsike vadhake.
an6.103:1.4_4: satthā ca me pariciṇṇo bhavissati mettāvatāyā’ti.
an6.103:1.5_2: cha ānisaṁse sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā sabbasaṅkhāresu anodhiṁ karitvā dukkhasaññaṁ upaṭṭhāpetun”ti.
an6.104:1.1_2: ānisaṁse sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā sabbadhammesu anodhiṁ karitvā anattasaññaṁ upaṭṭhāpetuṁ.
an6.104:1.4_2: cha ānisaṁse sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā sabbadhammesu anodhiṁ karitvā anattasaññaṁ upaṭṭhāpetun”ti.
an6.105:1.1_0: “Tayome, bhikkhave, bhavā pahātabbā, tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhitabbaṁ.

an6.105:1.8_3: imāsu ca tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhitasikkho hoti—
an6.106:1.1_0: “Tisso imā, bhikkhave, taṇhā pahātabbā, tayo ca mānā.

an6.140:1.4_0: Rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime cha dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti.
an6.141:1.3_0: Buddhānussati, dhammānussati, saṅghānussati, sīlānussati, cāgānussati, devatānussati.
